  8380                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8381                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8382                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8383                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8384                                  
  8385                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8386                                  
  8387                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8388                                  
  8389                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8390                                  
  8391                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8392                                  
  8393                                  ;************************************************************************
  8394                                  ;*									*
  8395                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8396                                  ;*									*
  8397                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8398                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8399                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8400                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8401                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8402                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8403                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8404                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8405                                  ;*									*
  8406                                  ;************************************************************************
  8407                                  
  8408                                  
  8409                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8410                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  8411                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8412 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  8413                                  
  8414                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8415 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8416                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8417 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8418                                  					; 00 init
  8419 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8420 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8421 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8422                                  					; 03
  8423 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8424                                  					; 04
  8425 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8426                                  					; 05
  8427 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8428 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8429                                  					; 07
  8430 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8431                                  					; 08
  8432 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8433 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8434                                  con_table_end:
  8435 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8436                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8437 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8438 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8439 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8440 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8441 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8442                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8443 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8444                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8445 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8446 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8447 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8448 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8449 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8450 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8451 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8452 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8453 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8454 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8455 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8456 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8457 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8458 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8459 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8460 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8461 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8462 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8463 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8464 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8465                                  prn_table_end:
  8466 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8467                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8468 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8469 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8470 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8471 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8472 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8473 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8474 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8475 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8476 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8477 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8478 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8479                                  aux_table_end:
  8480 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8481                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8482 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8483 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8484 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8485 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8486 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8487 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8488 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8489 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8490 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8491 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8492                                  tim_table_end:
  8493                                  
  8494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8495                                  
  8496                                  ;************************************************************************
  8497                                  ;*									*
  8498                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8499                                  ;*									*
  8500                                  ;************************************************************************
  8501                                  
  8502                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8503                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8504 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8505                                  con_loop:				
  8506 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8507 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8508 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8509                                  con_exit:				
  8510 00000164 F8                      		clc
  8511 00000165 C3                      		retn
  8512                                  
  8513                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8514                                  
  8515                                  ;************************************************************************
  8516                                  ;*									*
  8517                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8518                                  ;*									*
  8519                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8520                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8521                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8522                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8523                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8524                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8525                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8526                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8527                                  ;*									*
  8528                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8529                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8530                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8531                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8532                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8533                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8534                                  ;*									*
  8535                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8536                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8537                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8538                                  ;*									*
  8539                                  ;************************************************************************
  8540                                  
  8541                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8542                                  chrin:		
  8543 00000166 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8544 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8545 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8546 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8547 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8548 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8549 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8550 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8551 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8552 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8553 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8554 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8555                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8556                                  
  8557                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8558                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8559                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8560                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8561                                  ;      else
  8562                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8563                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8564                                  ;      endif
  8565                                  ;    endif
  8566                                  ;  endif
  8567                                  
  8568                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8569 00000183 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8570 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8571 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8572 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8573 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8574 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8575 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8576 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8578                                  
  8579                                  not_ext:				
  8580 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8581 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8582                                  alt_save:				
  8583 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8584                                  keyret:					
  8585 0000019E C3                      		retn
  8586                                  
  8587                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8588                                  
  8589                                  ;************************************************************************
  8590                                  ;*									*
  8591                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8592                                  ;*									*
  8593                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8594                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8595                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8596                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8597                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8598                                  ;*									*
  8599                                  ;************************************************************************
  8600                                  
  8601                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8602                                  con_rdnd:				
  8603 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8604 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8605 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8606 000001A6 8A26[DF04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8607 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8608 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8609 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8610 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8611 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8612                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8613 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8614                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8615 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8616 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8617 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8618 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8619                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8620                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8621                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8622                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8623 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8624 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8625 000001CA C3                      		retn
  8626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8627                                  
  8628                                  gotchr:					
  8629 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8630 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8631 000001CF 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8632 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8633 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8635                                  
  8636                                  notbrk:					
  8637 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8638 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8639 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8640 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8641                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8642                                  
  8643                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8644 000001E0 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8645 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8646 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8647 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8648 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8649 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8650 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8651                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8652                                  rdexit:					
  8653 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8654 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8655                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8656                                  bc_exvec:				
  8657 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8658                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8659 000001FB C3                      		retn
  8660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8661                                  
  8662                                  ;************************************************************************
  8663                                  ;*									*
  8664                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8665                                  ;*									*
  8666                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8667                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8668                                  ;*									*
  8669                                  ;************************************************************************
  8670                                  
  8671                                  con_writ:
  8672                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8673 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8674                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8675                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8676                                  con_lp:					
  8677 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8678 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  8679 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8680                                  					; AL = character to display
  8681 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8682                                  cc_ret:					
  8683 00000206 F8                      		clc
  8684 00000207 C3                      		retn
  8685                                  
  8686                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8687                                  
  8688                                  ;************************************************************************
  8689                                  ;*									*
  8690                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8691                                  ;*									*
  8692                                  ;************************************************************************
  8693                                  
  8694                                  con_flush:
  8695 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8696                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8697 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8698 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8699                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8700                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8701                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8702 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8703 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8704 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8705                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8706 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8707                                  
  8708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8709                                  
  8710                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8711                                  
  8712                                  ;************************************************************************
  8713                                  ;*									*
  8714                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8715                                  ;*									*
  8716                                  ;************************************************************************
  8717                                  
  8718                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8719                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8720                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8721                                  
  8722                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8723                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8724                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8725                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8726                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8727                                  ;
  8728                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8729                                  
  8730                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8731                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8732                                  
  8733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8734                                  
  8735                                  ;************************************************************************
  8736                                  ;*									*
  8737                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8738                                  ;*									*
  8739                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8740                                  ;*									*
  8741                                  ;************************************************************************
  8742                                  
  8743                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8744 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8745                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8746                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8747                                  prn_done:
  8748 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8749 0000021D C3                      		retn
  8750                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8751                                  
  8752                                  ;************************************************************************
  8753                                  ;*									*
  8754                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8755                                  ;*									*
  8756                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8757                                  ;*									*
  8758                                  ;************************************************************************
  8759                                  
  8760                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8761                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8762 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8763                                  prn_loop:				
  8764 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8765                                  prn_out:				
  8766 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8767 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8768 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8769 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8770 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8771 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8772 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8773 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8774 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8775 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8776 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8778                                  
  8779                                  _prnwf:					
  8780 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8781 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8782                                  TestPrnError:				
  8783 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8784 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8785                                  pmessg:					
  8786 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8788                                  
  8789                                  prn_con:				
  8790 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8791 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8792                                  ;prn_done:				
  8793                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8794                                  prn_done2:
  8795                                  		;clc
  8796                                  		; cf=0
  8797 0000024E C3                      		retn
  8798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8799                                  
  8800                                  ;************************************************************************
  8801                                  ;*									*
  8802                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8803                                  ;*									*
  8804                                  ;************************************************************************
  8805                                  
  8806                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8807 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8808 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8809 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8810                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8811                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8812 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8813 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8814                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8815                                  
  8816                                  ;************************************************************************
  8817                                  ;*									*
  8818                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8819                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8820                                  ;*									*
  8821                                  ;************************************************************************
  8822                                  
  8823                                  prnstat:				
  8824 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8825                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8826                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8827                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8828                                  
  8829                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8830                                  
  8831                                  ;************************************************************************
  8832                                  ;*									*
  8833                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8834                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8835                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8836                                  ;*									*
  8837                                  ;************************************************************************
  8838                                  
  8839                                  prnop:	
  8840 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8841 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8842                                  
  8843                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8844                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8845                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8846                                  
  8847 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  8848 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8849 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8850 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  8851 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8852 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8853 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8854                                  
  8855                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8856                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8857                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8858                                  
  8859                                  NextTest:				
  8860 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8861                                  					; i/o error?
  8862 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8863                                  
  8864                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8865                                  
  8866 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8867                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8868 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8869 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8870 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8871                                  ret1:					
  8872 00000282 C3                      		retn
  8873                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8874                                  
  8875                                  checknotready:				
  8876 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8877 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8878 00000288 C3                      		retn
  8879                                  
  8880                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8881                                  
  8882                                  ;************************************************************************
  8883                                  ;*									*
  8884                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8885                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8886                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8887                                  ;*									*
  8888                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8889                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8890                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8891                                  ;*									*
  8892                                  ;************************************************************************
  8893                                  
  8894                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8895                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8896 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8897                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8898 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  8899 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  8900 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8901 0000028F 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8902 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8903                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8904 00000295 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8905 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  8906                                  prn_getstat:				
  8907 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8908 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8909 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8910 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8911 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8912 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8913 000002A7 26                      		es
  8914 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  8915                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8916                                  					; lodsb
  8917 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8918 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8919 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8920 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8921                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8922                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8923                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8924 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8925                                  
  8926                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8927                                  
  8928                                  prn_bperr:				
  8929 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8930                                  prn_berr:				
  8931 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8932                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8933                                  
  8934                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8935                                  
  8936                                  ;************************************************************************
  8937                                  ;*									*
  8938                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8939                                  ;*									*
  8940                                  ;************************************************************************
  8941                                  
  8942                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8943                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8944                                  
  8945                                  ;********************************;*
  8946                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8947                                  ;********************************;*
  8948                                  
  8949                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8950                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8951                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8952                                  
  8953                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8954                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8955                                  ;;endstruc
  8956                                  
  8957                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8958                                  
  8959                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8960                                  
  8961                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8962                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8963 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8964 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8965                                  					; ioc_pc
  8966 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8967                                  
  8968                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8969 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8970                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8971                                  
  8972                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8973 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8974 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8975 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8976                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8977 000002CF 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8978 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8979                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8980 000002D5 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]

  8982 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8983 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8984 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8985 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8986                                  prngetcount:				
  8987                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8988 000002E4 898F[E104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8989 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8990                                  					; return current retry count
  8991                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8992                                  		; cf=0
  8993                                  		;clc
  8994 000002EB C3                      		retn

  9027                                  ;************************************************************************
  9028                                  ;*									*
  9029                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9030                                  ;*									*
  9031                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9032                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9033                                  ;*									*

  9035                                  
  9036                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9037                                  
  9038                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9039                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9040                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status

  9043                                  
  9044                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9045                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9046                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9047                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9048                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9049                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9050                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout

  9052                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9053

  9055                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready

  9063                                  ;*		   at es:di						*

  9072 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9073 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al

  9077                                  					; won't return if error

  9108                                  		;xor	al, al

  9110                                  		; 11/08/2023

  9116                                  ;************************************************************************

  9129 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9130 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9131 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)

  9152 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9153 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9154                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9156                                  		;clc

  9160                                  ;************************************************************************

  9163                                  ;*									*
  9164                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9165                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9166                                  ;*									*
  9167                                  ;************************************************************************
  9168                                  
  9169                                  auxstat:				
  9170 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9171                                  
  9172                                  		; fall into auxop
  9173                                  
  9174                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9175                                  
  9176                                  ;************************************************************************
  9177                                  ;*									*
  9178                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9179                                  ;*									*
  9180                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9181                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9182                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*

  9186                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9187 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9188                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9189                                  					; get port number
  9190 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9191                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9192                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9193 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9194                                  
  9195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9196                                  
  9197                                  ;************************************************************************
  9198                                  ;*									*
  9199                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9200                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9201                                  ;*									*
  9202                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9203                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9204                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9205                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9206                                  ;*									*
  9207                                  ;************************************************************************
  9208                                  
  9209                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9210 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer

  9212                                  					; zero out buffer
  9213                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9214                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9216 00000368 C3                      		retn
  9217                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9218                                  
  9219                                  ;************************************************************************
  9220                                  ;*									*
  9221                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9222                                  ;*									*
  9223                                  ;************************************************************************
  9224                                  
  9225                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9226                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9227 00000369 E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022

  9233 00000371 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9234 00000374 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9235 00000377 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9236 00000379 B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9237 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9238                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9239                                  
  9240                                  awok:					
  9241 0000037E E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9242                                  					; still	more character to print
  9243                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9244                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9245                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9246 00000380 C3                      		retn
  9247                                  
  9248                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9249

  9253                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9254                                  ;*									*

  9257                                  getbx:

  9259                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])

  9261 00000385 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9262                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9264 00000389 C3                      		retn
  9265

  9267                                  
  9268                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9269                                  
  9270                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9271                                  ;								:
  9272                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9273                                  ;								:
  9274                                  ;								:
  9275                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9276                                  ;								:
  9277                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9278                                  ;								:
  9279                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9280                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9281                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9282                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9283                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9284                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9285                                  ;								:
  9286                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9287                                  ;								:
  9288                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9289                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9290                                  ;								:
  9291                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9292                                  
  9293                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9294                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9295                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9296                                  
  9297                                  ;19/07/2019
  9298                                  ;09/03/2019
  9299                                  
  9300                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9301                                  
  9302                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9303                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9304                                  
  9305 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9306 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9307 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9308 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9309 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9310 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9311 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9312 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9313 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9314 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9315 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9316 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9317 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9318 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9319 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9320                                  
  9321                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9322                                  
  9323 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9324 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9325 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9326 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9327 000003B2 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9328 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9329 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9330 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9331 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9332 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9333 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9334 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9335 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9336 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9337 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9338 000003C8 98                      		cbw
  9339 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9340 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9341 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9342 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
  9343                                  
  9344                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9345                                  
  9346                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9347                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9348                                  
  9349                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9350                                  ;
  9351                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9352                                  ;
  9353                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9354                                  ;
  9355                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9356                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9357                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9358                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9359                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9360                                  ;
  9361                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9362                                  ;
  9363                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9364                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9365                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9366                                  ;
  9367                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9368                                  
  9369                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9370                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
  9371                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9372 000003CF 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9373 000003D2 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9374                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9375 000003D3 803E[EC04]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9376                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9377 000003D8 7423                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9378 000003DA 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9379                                  					; get binary hours
  9380                                  					; convert to bcd
  9381                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9382                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9383                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9384 000003DE E8E800                  		call	bintobcd
  9385 000003E1 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9386 000003E3 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9387                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9388                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9389 000003E7 E8DF00                  		call	bintobcd
  9390 000003EA 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9391 000003EC 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9392                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9393                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd
  9394 000003F0 E8D600                  		call	bintobcd
  9395                                  
  9396 000003F3 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9397 000003F5 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9398 000003F7 FA                      		cli
  9399 000003F8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9400 000003FA CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9401                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9402                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9403                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9404 000003FC FB                      		sti
  9405                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9406 000003FD 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9407 00000401 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9408                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9409 00000405 FF1E[B806]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9410                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9411                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9412                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9413 00000409 FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9414 0000040A B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9415 0000040C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9416                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9417                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9418                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9419 0000040E 8F06[E904]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9420 00000412 FB                      		sti
  9421                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9422 00000413 803E[EC04]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9423 00000418 7409                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9424

  9428                                  					; convert to bcd format

  9430

  9432 0000041E B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9433 00000420 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9434                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9435                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9436                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set

  9438                                  no_cmos_2:
  9439                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9440                                  		; cf=0
  9441                                  		;clc
  9442 00000423 C3                      		retn

  9448                                  %if 1

  9451                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  9452                                  
  9453                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
  9454                                  
  9455                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  9456                                  ;
  9457                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  9458                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  9459                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  9460                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  9461                                  
  9462                                  		; 20/12/2023
  9463                                  
  9464                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
  9465                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
  9466 00000424 FF36[E904]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
  9467 00000428 813E[E904]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9468                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  9469 0000042E 7308                    		jnb	short century20
  9470                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
  9471                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
  9472                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9473 00000430 C706[ED04]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
  9474 00000436 EB0C                    		jmp	short years
  9475                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9476                                  		
  9477                                  century20:				
  9478                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 20
  9479                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 0
  9480                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9481 00000438 C706[ED04]1400          		mov	word [base_century], 20
  9482 0000043E 812E[E904]891C          		sub	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9483                                  					; adjust daycnt
  9484                                  years:					
  9485 00000444 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9486 00000446 A1[E904]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9487 00000449 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  9488                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  9489 0000044C F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  9490 0000044E 8916[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  9491 00000452 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  9492 00000454 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  9493 00000456 0006[EE04]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  9494 0000045A FF06[E904]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  9495                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9496 0000045E BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
  9497 00000461 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
  9498                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
  9499 00000464 391E[E904]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
  9500 00000468 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  9501 0000046A FE06[EE04]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  9502                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  9503 0000046E 291E[E904]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
  9504                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  9505                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9506 00000472 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365
  9507                                  regularyear:	; 20/12/2023 (BugFix)
  9508                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
  9509 00000473 391E[E904]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9510 00000477 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  9511 00000479 FE06[EE04]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
  9512                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
  9513 0000047D 291E[E904]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
  9514 00000481 E2F0                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  9515                                  					;
  9516                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9517                                  leapyear:	
  9518 00000483 C606[F004]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
  9519                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  9520                                  					; change month table.
  9521                                  yeardone:				
  9522 00000488 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  9523 0000048A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9524 0000048C A1[E904]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9525                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  9526 0000048F BE[EF04]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  9527                                  		;mov	cx, 12
  9528                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9529 00000492 B10C                    		mov	cl, 12
  9530                                  months:					
  9531 00000494 FEC3                    		inc	bl
  9532                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9533 00000496 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:04B7h
  9534 00000498 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  9535                                  					; dh=0
  9536 0000049A 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  9537 0000049C 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  9538 0000049D 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  9539 0000049F E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  9540                                  					; should never fall through loop
  9541                                  month_done:	
  9542 000004A1 C606[F004]1C            		mov	byte [february], 28 ; 08/08/2023
  9543                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 28
  9544                                  					; restore month table value
  9545 000004A6 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  9546 000004A8 8A36[EE04]              		mov	dh, [base_year]
  9547 000004AC 8A0E[ED04]              		mov	cl, [base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  9548 000004B0 E81600                  		call	bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  9549                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  9550 000004B3 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  9551 000004B5 E81100                  		call	bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  9552 000004B8 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  9553 000004BA E80C00                  		call	bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  9554 000004BD 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  9555 000004BF E80700                  		call	bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  9556 000004C2 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  9557 000004C4 8F06[E904]              		pop	word [daycnt] ; restore original value
  9558 000004C8 C3                      		retn
  9559                                  
  9560                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9561                                  
  9562                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
  9563                                  
  9564                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  9565                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  9566                                  		
  9567 000004C9 D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
  9568 000004CB D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
  9569                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0
  9570 000004CD C3                      		retn
  9571                                  %endif
