 11574                                  
 11575                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11576                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11577                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11578                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11579                                  
 11580                                  do_write:
 11581 00000B8D 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11582 00000B91 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11583 00000B93 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11584 00000B97 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11585                                  do_norm:
 11586 00000B99 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11587 00000B9C EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11589                                  
 11590                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11591                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11592                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11593                                  
 11594                                  doverify:
 11595 00000B9E 58                      		pop	ax
 11596 00000B9F 50                      		push	ax
 11597 00000BA0 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11598 00000BA2 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 11599 00000BA5 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11600                                  
 11601                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11602                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11603                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11604                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11605                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11606                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11607                                  
 11608 00000BA7 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11609 00000BAA 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11610 00000BAC FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11611 00000BB0 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11612 00000BB2 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11613 00000BB5 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11615                                  
 11616                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 11617 00000BB7 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 11618 00000BBA FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11619 00000BBE EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11621                                  
 11622                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11623                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11624                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11625                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11626                                  
 11627                                  dskerr:
 11628 00000BC0 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 11629 00000BC5 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11630 00000BC7 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 11631                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 11632 00000BCA 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11633 00000BCF 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11634 00000BD1 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11635 00000BD4 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11636                                  dochkagain:
 11637 00000BD9 E8A900                  		call	again
 11638                                  dskerr0:
 11639 00000BDC 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11640 00000BDE 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11641                                  					; fnon_removable
 11642 00000BE3 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11643 00000BE5 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11644 00000BE8 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11645                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 11646 00000BEA 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11647 00000BED 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11648 00000BEF C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11649                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11650                                  dskerr1:
 11651 00000BF5 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11652                                  		;jmp	retry
 11653                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11654 00000BF6 E900FF                  		jmp	_retry
 11655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11656                                  
 11657                                  write_fault_err:
 11658 00000BF9 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11659                                  					; for write fault error.
 11660 00000BFC EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11661                                  
 11662                                  		; fall into harderr
 11663                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11664                                  
 11665                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11666                                  
 11667                                  harderr:
 11668 00000BFE E84C00                  		call	maperror
 11669                                  harderr2:
 11670 00000C01 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11671                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11672 00000C06 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11673 00000C0A 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11674                                  
 11675                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11676                                  
 11677                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11678                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11679 00000C0E E917FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11680                                  
 11681                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11682                                  
 11683                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11684                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11685                                  
 11686                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11687                                  normspeed:
 11688 00000C11 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11689 00000C16 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11690 00000C18 06                      		push	es
 11691 00000C19 50                      		push	ax
 11692 00000C1A A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11693 00000C1D C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11694 00000C21 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11695 00000C25 58                      		pop	ax
 11696 00000C26 07                      		pop	es
 11697 00000C27 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 11698                                  		; 24/12/2023
 11699                                  		;push	es
 11700                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 11701                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11702                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 11703                                  		;pop	es
 11704 00000C2A 1E                      		push	ds
 11705 00000C2B C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11706 00000C2F C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 11707 00000C33 1F                      		pop	ds
 11708                                  
 11709 00000C34 C3                      		retn
 11710                                  
 11711                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11712                                  
 11713                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11714                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11715                                  
 11716                                  fastspeed:
 11717 00000C35 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11718                                  					; ftoobig
 11719 00000C3A 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11720 00000C3C 06                      		push	es
 11721 00000C3D 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11722 00000C41 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11723 00000C43 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11724 00000C47 07                      		pop	es
 11725 00000C48 C3                      		retn
 11726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11727                                  
 11728                                  notready:
 11729 00000C49 F9                      		stc
 11730 00000C4A B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11731 00000C4C C3                      		retn
 11732                                  
 11733                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11734                                  
 11735                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11736                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11737                                  
 11738                                  maperror:
 11739 00000C4D 51                      		push	cx
 11740 00000C4E 06                      		push	es
 11741 00000C4F 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11742 00000C50 07                      		pop	es
 11743 00000C51 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11744 00000C53 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11745                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11746 00000C56 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11747                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11748 00000C59 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11749 00000C5C F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11750                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11751                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11752                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11753 00000C5E 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11754                                  					; get translation
 11755                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11756                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11757 00000C61 07                      		pop	es
 11758 00000C62 59                      		pop	cx
 11759 00000C63 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11760 00000C64 C3                      		retn
 11761                                  
 11762                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11763                                  
 11764                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11765                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11766                                  
 11767                                  set_tim:
 11768 00000C65 50                      		push	ax
 11769 00000C66 E8B2F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11770                                  
 11771                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11772                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11773                                  
 11774 00000C69 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11775 00000C6D 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11776 00000C6F 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11777                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11778                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11779 00000C73 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11780                                  setaccess:
 11781 00000C75 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11782 00000C7A 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11783 00000C7E 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11784                                  done_set:
 11785 00000C82 F8                      		clc
 11786                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11787 00000C83 58                      		pop	ax
 11788 00000C84 C3                      		retn
 11789                                  
 11790                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11791                                  
 11792                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11793                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11794                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11795                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11796                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11797                                  
 11798                                  again:	
 11799 00000C85 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11800 00000C88 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11801 00000C8B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11802                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11803 00000C8D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11804 00000C8E C3                      		retn
 11805                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11806                                  
 11807                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 11808 00000C8F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11809 00000C91 C3                      		retn
 11810

 11823                                  ;
 11824                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11825                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11826                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11827                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed

 11831                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11915                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11916                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11917                                  ;
 11918                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11919                                  ;
 11920                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11921                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11922                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11923                                  ;
 11924                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11925                                  
 11926                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11927                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11928                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11929 00000CC2 E8A5F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11930 00000CC5 06                      		push	es
 11931 00000CC6 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11932 00000CCA 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11933                                  					; RAWIO
 11934 00000CCF 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11935 00000CD3 07                      		pop	es
 11936 00000CD4 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11937                                  
 11938                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11939                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11940                                  
 11941                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11942 00000CD6 BE[930C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11943                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11944                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11945 00000CD9 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11946 00000CDB 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11947                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11948 00000CDD BE[A60C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11949                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11950                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11951                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11952 00000CE0 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11953 00000CE2 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11954 00000CE4 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11955 00000CE7 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11956 00000CE9 98                      		cbw
 11957 00000CEA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11958 00000CEC 46                      		inc	si
 11959 00000CED 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11960 00000CEF 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11961                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11962 00000CF2 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11963                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11964                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11965 00000CF7 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11966 00000CF9 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11967                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11968                                  
 11969                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11970                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11971                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11972 00000CFA 5A                      		pop	dx
 11973

 11975 00000CFB E9D7F3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11980                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11981                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11982                                  ;
 11983                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11984                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11985                                  ;
 11986                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11987                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11988                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11989                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11990                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11991                                  
 11992                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11993                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11994                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11995                                  
 11996 00000CFE C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11997 00000D02 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11998                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11999 00000D05 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12000 00000D09 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12001 00000D0C 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12002 00000D10 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 12003                                  					; Mask off other bits
 12004 00000D13 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 12005 00000D16 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12006 00000D1A 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 12007 00000D1D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 12008 00000D1F 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 12009                                  					
 12010                                  		; copy recommended bpb

 12213                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12214                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12215                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12216                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12217                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12218                                  ;
 12219                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12220                                  ;
 12221                                  ; output:
 12222                                  ;	for status call:
 12223                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12224                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12225                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12226                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12227                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12228                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12229                                  ;
 12230                                  ;	for format track:
 12231                                  ;		carry set if error
 12232                                  ;
 12233                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12234                                  
 12235                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12236

 12387                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12388                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12389                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12390                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12391                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12392                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12393                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12394                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12395                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 12397                                  		; register.

 12502                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12503                                  
 12504                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12505                                  ;
 12506                                  ; TrackIo:
 12507                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12508                                  ;
 12509                                  ;   input:
 12510                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12511                                  ;		  3 = write
 12512                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12513                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12514                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12515                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12516                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12517                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12518                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12519                                  ;
 12520                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12521                                  
 12522                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12523                                  		
 12524                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12525                                  TrackIo:	
 12526                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12527 00000F74 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12528 00000F78 E84EF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv

 12535 00000F87 59                      		pop	cx
 12536 00000F88 58                      		pop	ax

 12542                                  
 12543                                  		; WE WANT:
 12544                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12545                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12546

 12548                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12555                                  ionextsector:

 12560                                  					; the track table

 12564                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12565                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12566                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12567                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12568                                  		; 3). Good track layout

 12675                                  ;
 12676                                  ; SetDASD
 12677                                  ;
 12678                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12679                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12680                                  ;
 12681                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds

 12684                                  
 12685                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12686                                  SetDasd:
 12687 00000FF7 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12688                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12689 00000FFC 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12690                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12691 00000FFE 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12693                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12694 00001003 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12695                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12696 00001005 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh

 12698                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12699                                  DoSetDasd:
 12700 0000100A C606[2806]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12701 0000100F C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12702 00001014 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12703                                  		; 02/09/2023

 12705 0000101A 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2

 12707                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB

 12714                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI

 12752 00001049 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12753                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12754                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12755 0000104B 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12756 0000104F 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 12759                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12760                                  
 12761                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12762                                  
 12763                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12764                                  ;
 12765                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12766                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12767                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12768                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12769                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12770                                  ;
 12771                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12772                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12773                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12774                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12775                                  ;
 12776                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12777                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12778                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12779                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12780                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12783                                  
 12784                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12785                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12786 00001054 51                      		push	cx
 12787 00001055 52                      		push	dx
 12788                                  
 12789                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12790                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12791                                  
 12792 00001056 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12793 0000105B 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12794 0000105D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12795 0000105F 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12796 00001064 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12797 00001066 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12799                                  
 12800                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12801 00001068 06                      		push	es
 12802 00001069 56                      		push	si
 12803                                  		
 12804                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12805                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12806 0000106A 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12807 0000106C 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12808                                  
 12809 0000106E 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12810                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12811                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12812 00001073 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12813 00001077 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12814                                  
 12815                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12816                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12817                                  
 12818 0000107B 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12819 00001080 5E                      		pop	si
 12820 00001081 07                      		pop	es
 12821                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12822 00001082 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12823 00001086 49                      		dec	cx
 12824 00001087 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12825 0000108A D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12826 0000108C D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12827 0000108E 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12828 00001090 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12829 00001094 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]

 12833 0000109B 57                      		push	di
 12834 0000109C B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12835 0000109E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12836                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12837 000010A0 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12838 000010A2 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12839 000010A7 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12840 000010A9 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12841                                  
 12842                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12843                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12844 000010AA 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12845 000010AC 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12846 000010AE 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12847                                  
 12848 000010AF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12849                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12850                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12851 000010B4 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12852 000010B8 8C06[2B06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12853                                  
 12854                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12855                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12856                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12857                                  		;mov	es, si
 12858 000010BC 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12859                                  
 12860                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12861 000010BD 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12862                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12863 000010C2 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]

 12926                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset

 12959                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12963                                  ;

 12972                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13

 13033                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13035                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13036                                  
 13037                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13038                                  ;
 13039                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13040                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13041                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13042                                  ;
 13043                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13044                                  
 13045                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13046                                  ioctl_getown:
 13047 00001154 E813F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13048 00001157 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13049                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13050 0000115B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13051                                  ownloop:				
 13052 0000115F 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13053 00001163 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13054                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13055 00001165 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13056                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13057                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13058 0000116A 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13059                                  getnextBDS:				
 13060 0000116C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13061 0000116F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13063                                  
 13064                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13065                                  ;
 13066                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13067                                  ; in al to al.
 13068                                  ;
 13069                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13070                                  
 13071                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13072                                  ioctl_setown:
 13073 00001171 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13074 00001174 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13075                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13076 00001179 E84DF7                  		call	checksingle

 13078 0000117C FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13079                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13080                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13081                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13082                                  
 13083                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13084                                  ;
 13085                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13086                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13087                                  ;
 13088                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13089                                  
 13090                                  exitown:				
 13091 00001180 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl

 13095                                  					; fi_am_mult

 13167                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13168                                  ;	get media id
 13169                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13170                                  ;
 13171                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13172                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13173                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13174                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13175                                  ;
 13176                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13177                                  ;
 13178                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13179                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13180                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13181                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13182                                  ;
 13183                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13184                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13185                                  ;
 13186                                  ; LOGIC:
 13187                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13188                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13189                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13190                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13191                                  ;
 13192                                  ; {
 13193                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13194                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13195                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13196                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13197                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13198                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13199                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13200                                  ;		};
 13201                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13202                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13203                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13204                                  ;		};
 13205                                  ;	else
 13206                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13207                                  ;
 13208                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13209                                  
 13210                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13211                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13212                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13213                                  
 13214                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13215                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13216                                  GetMediaId:
 13217 000011BF E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13218 000011C2 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13219 000011C6 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13220 000011CB E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13221 000011CE 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13222                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13223 000011D0 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13224                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13225                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13226                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13227 000011D5 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13228                                  
 13229                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13230 000011D7 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13231 000011DA 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13232                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13233                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13234 000011DD 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13235 000011DF C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13236 000011E3 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13237                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13238 000011E7 46                      		inc	si
 13239                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13240                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13241 000011E8 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13242                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13243 000011EB B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13244                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13245                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13246 000011EE F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13247                                  	
 13248                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13249                                  		; cf = 0
 13250                                  		;clc
 13251                                  
 13252 000011F0 C3                      		retn
 13253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13254                                  
 13255                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13256                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13257 000011F1 F9                      		stc	
 13258                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13259 000011F2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13260                                  		;stc
 13261                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13262                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13263 000011F4 C3                      		retn
 13264                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13265                                  
 13266                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13267                                  
 13268                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13269                                  ;  set media id
 13270                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13271                                  
 13272                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13273                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13274                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13275                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13276                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13277                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13278                                  ;
 13279                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13280                                  ;
 13281                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13282                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13283                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13284                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13285                                  ;
 13286                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13287                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13288                                  ;
 13289                                  ; logic:
 13290                                  ;
 13291                                  ; {
 13292                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13293                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13294                                  ;	BootIo;
 13295                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13296                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13297                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13298                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13299                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13300                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13301                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13302                                  ;		};
 13303                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13304                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13305                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13306                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13307                                  ;		};
 13308                                  ;	else
 13309                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13310                                  ;
 13311                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13312                                  
 13313                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13314                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13315                                  SetMediaId:
 13316 000011F5 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13317 000011F8 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13318                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13319 000011FC 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13320 000011FE C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13321 00001203 52                      		push	dx
 13322 00001204 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13323 00001207 5A                      		pop	dx
 13324 00001208 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13325                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13326 0000120A 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13327                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13328 0000120F 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13329                                  		
 13330 00001211 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13331                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13332                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13333                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13334 00001216 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13335                                  
 13336 00001218 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13337 00001219 57                      		push	di
 13338 0000121A 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13339 0000121B 07                      		pop	es
 13340 0000121C BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13341 0000121F C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13342 00001223 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13343 00001226 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13344                                  
 13345                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13346                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13347                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13348                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13349                                  		;rep movsb
 13350 00001229 E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13351                                  
 13352 0000122C 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13353 0000122D 1F                      		pop	ds
 13354 0000122E 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13355 0000122F 07                      		pop	es
 13356 00001230 E892F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13357 00001233 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13358 00001235 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13359 0000123A E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13360 0000123D C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13361                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13362                                  					; return with error code from BootIo

 13375                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13376                                  
 13377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13378                                  ;	BootIo
 13379                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13380                                  ;
 13381                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13382                                  ;
 13383                                  ; input :
 13384                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13385                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13386                                  ;
 13387                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13388                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13389                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13390                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13391                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13392                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13393                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13394                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13395                                  ;
 13396                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13397                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13398                                  ;
 13399                                  ; logic:
 13400                                  ;
 13401                                  ; {
 13402                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13403                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13404                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13405                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13406                                  ; }
 13407                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13408                                  
 13409                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13410                                  BootIo:	
 13411 00001243 06                      		push	es
 13412 00001244 57                      		push	di
 13413 00001245 53                      		push	bx
 13414 00001246 1E                      		push	ds
 13415 00001247 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13416                                  
 13417                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13418                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13419                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13420                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13421                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13422                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13423                                  
 13424 00001248 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13425 0000124B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13426 0000124D 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13427 00001251 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13428 00001254 E8FCF6                  		call	diskio
 13429 00001257 5B                      		pop	bx
 13430 00001258 5F                      		pop	di
 13431 00001259 07                      		pop	es
 13432 0000125A C3                      		retn
 13433                                  
 13434                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13435                                  
 13436                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13437                                  
 13438                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13439                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13440                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13441                                  ;
 13442                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13443                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13444                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13445                                  ; history in the flags.
 13446                                  ;
 13447                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13448                                  ;
 13449                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13450                                  ;
 13451                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13452                                  ;
 13453                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13454                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13455                                  ;
 13456                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13457                                  
 13458                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13459 0000125B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13460 0000125F 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13461 00001261 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13462                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13463 00001263 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13464                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13465                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13466 00001268 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13467 0000126A 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13468 0000126F 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13469 00001271 E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13470 00001274 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13471                                  
 13472                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13473                                  
 13474 00001276 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13475 00001278 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13476                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13477                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13478 0000127A 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13479 0000127C 53                      		push	bx
 13480 0000127D BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13481                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13482                                  					; physical drive
 13483 00001280 E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13484 00001283 5B                      		pop	bx
 13485                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13486 00001284 C3                      		retn
 13487                                  
 13488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13489                                  
 13490                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13491                                  
 13492                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13493                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13494                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13495                                  ;
 13496                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13497                                  ;
 13498                                  ; INPUT :
 13499                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13500                                  ;
 13501                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13502                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13503                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13504                                  
 13505                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13506                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13507 00001285 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13508 00001289 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13509                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13510                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13511 0000128C 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13512                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13513 0000128E 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13514                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13515                                  					; unformatted_media
 13516 00001293 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13517                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13518                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13519 00001295 40                      		inc	ax
 13520                                  GafDone:
 13521 00001296 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13522 00001299 C3                      		retn
 13523                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13524                                  
 13525                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13526                                  
 13527                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13528                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13529                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13530                                  ;
 13531                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13532                                  ;
 13533                                  ; input :
 13534                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13535                                  ;
 13536                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13537                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13538                                  
 13539                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13540                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13541 0000129A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13542 0000129E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13543                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13544 000012A1 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13545                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13546                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13547 000012A6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13548 000012AA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13549                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13550 000012AC 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13551                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13552                                  					; unformatted_media
 13553                                  saf_Done:				
 13554 000012B1 C3                      		retn

 13559                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13560                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13561                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13562                                  ;
 13563                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13564                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13565                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13566                                  ;
 13567                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13568                                  
 13569                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13570                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13571 000012B2 06                      		push	es
 13572 000012B3 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13573 000012B7 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13574                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13575                                  
 13576                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13577                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13578                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13579                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13580                                  
 13581 000012BB 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13582                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13583 000012BD 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13584                                  ioctl_support:
 13585 000012BF 0E                      		push	cs
 13586 000012C0 07                      		pop	es
 13587                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13588                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13589 000012C1 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13590                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13591 000012C4 BF[B70C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13592                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13593                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13594 000012C7 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13595 000012C9 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13596 000012CB 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13597 000012CD B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13598                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13599                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13600                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13601                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13602                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13603                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13604                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13605 000012D0 07                      		pop	es
 13606                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13607                                  		; cf = 0
 13608                                  		;clc
 13609 000012D1 C3                      		retn
 13610                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13611                                  nosupport:
 13612 000012D2 07                      		pop	es
 13613 000012D3 E9FFED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
