 14901                                  
 14902                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14903                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14904                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14905                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14906                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14907                                  
 14908                                  install_bds:
 14909 0000173D 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14910 0000173E BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14911                                  
 14912                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14913                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14914                                  loop_next_bds:
 14915 00001741 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14916                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14917 00001743 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14918 00001747 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14919                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14920 0000174A 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14921 0000174C B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14922 0000174E 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14923                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14924 00001752 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14925 00001755 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14926                                  					; we don't own it
 14927 0000175A 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14928                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14929 0000175D 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14930 00001760 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14931                                  next_bds:
 14932                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14933 00001764 B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14934 00001767 3904                    		cmp	[si], ax	; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14935                                  		;cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14936                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14937 00001769 75D6                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14938 0000176B 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14939                                  					; install bds
 14940 0000176E 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14941 00001770 268905                  		mov	[es:di], ax	; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14942                                  		;mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14943                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14944 00001773 1F                      		pop	ds

 15057 000017C4 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15058 000017C6 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15058 000017CF 736B6574746520666F-
 15058 000017D8 7220647269766520   
 15059                                  
 15060                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15061 000017E0 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15061 000017E9 65737320616E79206B-
 15061 000017F2 6579207768656E2072-
 15061 000017FB 656164790D0A       
 15062 00001801 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15063                                  
 15064                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15065                                  
 15066                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15067                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15068                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15069                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15070                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15071                                  
 15072                                  chkopcnt:		
 15073 00001803 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15074 00001808 C3                      		retn
 15075                                  
 15076                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15077                                  
 15078                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15079                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15080                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15081                                  ;
 15082                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15083                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15084                                  
 15085                                  mediacheck:	
 15086 00001809 E8BDF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15087 0000180C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15088 0000180E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15089 00001811 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15090 00001813 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15091 00001816 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15092 00001818 50                      		push	ax
 15093 00001819 52                      		push	dx
 15094 0000181A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15095                                  					; set logical drive number
 15096 0000181E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15097 00001820 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15098                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15099                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15100 00001822 5A                      		pop	dx
 15101 00001823 58                      		pop	ax
 15102 00001824 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15103 00001826 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15104                                  
 15105                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15106                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15107                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15108                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15109                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15110                                  ; status.
 15111                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15112 00001829 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15113 0000182D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15114                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15115                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15116                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15117                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15118 00001831 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15119                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15120                                  
 15121                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15122                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15123                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15124                                  
 15125 00001833 50                      		push	ax
 15126 00001834 51                      		push	cx
 15127 00001835 52                      		push	dx
 15128 00001836 E8B7ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15129 00001839 5A                      		pop	dx
 15130 0000183A 59                      		pop	cx
 15131 0000183B 58                      		pop	ax
 15132 0000183C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15133 0000183E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15134                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15135 00001840 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15136                                  mediaret:				
 15137 00001842 C3                      		retn
 15138                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15139                                  
 15140                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15141                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15142                                  ; or write.
 15143                                  
 15144                                  mediadovolid:				
 15145 00001843 E84AEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15146 00001846 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15147 00001848 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15148 0000184B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15149 0000184D E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15150                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15151                                  
 15152                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15153                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15154                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15155                                  ; dos.
 15156                                  ;
 15157                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15158                                  
 15159                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15160                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15161                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15162                                  
 15163                                  checklatchio:	
 15164                                  
 15165                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15166                                  			
 15167 00001850 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15168 00001853 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15169                                  
 15170                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15171                                  
 15172 00001855 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15173 00001858 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15174                                  
 15175                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15176                                  ; expensive verification.
 15177                                  
 15178 0000185A E833EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15179 0000185D 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15180 0000185F E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15181 00001862 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15182 00001864 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15183 00001866 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15184 00001868 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15185                                  checklatchret:				
 15186 0000186B E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15187                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15188 0000186E F9                      		stc
 15189 0000186F 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15190                                  checkret:				
 15191 00001870 C3                      		retn
 15192                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15193                                  
 15194                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15195                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15196                                  ;
 15197                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15198                                  
 15199                                  checkfatvid:				
 15200 00001871 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15201 00001874 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15202 00001876 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15203                                  
 15204                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15205                                  
 15206                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15207                                  
 15208                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15209                                  
 15210                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15211                                  ;
 15212                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15213                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15214                                  ;
 15215                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15216                                  ;
 15217                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15218                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15219                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15220                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15221                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15222                                  ;
 15223                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15224                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15225                                  ; routine.)
 15226                                  ;
 15227                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15228                                  
 15229                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15230                                  check_vid:
 15231                                  
 15232                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15233                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15234                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15235                                  
 15236 00001878 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15237                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15238                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15239 0000187D 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15240 0000187F E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15241 00001882 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15242 00001884 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15243 00001886 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15244                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15245 0000188B 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15246                                  					; if not fat system
 15247 0000188D E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15248 00001890 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15249 00001892 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15250 00001895 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15251                                  					; definitely changed
 15252 00001898 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15253                                  
 15254 0000189A 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15255                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15256 0000189B E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15257                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15258                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15259                                  		;clc
 15260                                  checkfatret:				
 15261 0000189E C3                      		retn
 15262                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15263                                  
 15264                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15265                                  changed_drv:
 15266 0000189F F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15267 000018A0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15268                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15269 000018A5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15271                                  
 15272                                  ; extended id check
 15273                                  
 15274                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15275                                  
 15276                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15277                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15278                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15279                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15280                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15281                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15282                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15283                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15284                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15285                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15286                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15287                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15288                                  ;
 15289                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15290                                  
 15291                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15292                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15293 000018A6 50                      		push	ax
 15294                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15295                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15296 000018A7 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15297                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15298 000018AA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15299 000018AC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15300 000018B0 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15301 000018B2 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15302 000018B5 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15303 000018B9 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15304                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15305                                  					; don't know
 15306 000018BB 58                      		pop	ax
 15307 000018BC EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15308                                  					; reset the flag
 15309                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15310                                  
 15311                                  ext_changed:
 15312 000018BE 58                      		pop	ax
 15313                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15314 000018BF 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15315                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15316                                  					; disk changed!
 15317                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15318                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15319                                  		;clc
 15320 000018C0 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15321                                  
 15322                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15323                                  
 15324                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15325                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15326                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15327                                  ;
 15328                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15329                                  
 15330                                  checkio:				
 15331 000018C2 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15332 000018C5 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15333 000018C7 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15334 000018CA 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15335 000018CC E8C1ED                  		call	GetBp
 15336 000018CF 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15337 000018D1 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15338 000018D4 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15339 000018D6 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15340 000018D8 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15341 000018DA 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15342 000018DB C3                      		retn
 15343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15344                                  
 15345                                  checkioerr:				
 15346 000018DC E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15347                                  
 15348                                  checkioret:				
 15349 000018DF F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15350 000018E0 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 15351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15352                                  
 15353                                  no_error_map:				
 15354 000018E3 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15355                                  
 15356                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15357                                  
 15358                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15359                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15360                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15361                                  
 15362                                  returnvid:		
 15363 000018E6 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15364                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15365 000018E9 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15366 000018EC B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15367 000018EE F9                      		stc
 15368 000018EF C3                      		retn
 15369                                  
 15370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15371                                  
 15372                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15373                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15374                                  ;
 15375                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15376                                  ; **trashes si**
 15377                                  
 15378                                  media_set_vid:				
 15379 000018F0 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15380                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15381                                  
 15382                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15383                                  
 15384                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15385                                  
 15386                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15387                                  
 15388                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15389                                  vid_into_packet:
 15390 000018F3 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15391 000018F4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15392 000018F8 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15393 000018FB 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15394 000018FD 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15395 00001900 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15396 00001903 1F                      		pop	ds
 15397                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15398 00001904 C3                      		retn
 15399                                  
 15400                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15401                                  
 15402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15403                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15404                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15405                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15406                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15407                                  ;
 15408                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15409                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15410                                  ;
 15411                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15412                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15413                                  ;		carry set
 15414                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15415                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15416                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15417                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15418                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15419                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15420                                  ;
 15421                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15422                                  
 15423                                  hidensity:
 15424                                  
 15425                                  ; check for correct drive
 15426                                  		
 15427                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15428 00001905 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15429                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15430                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15431 0000190A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15432                                  
 15433                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15434                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15435                                  
 15436 0000190C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15437 00001911 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15438                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15439                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15440 00001913 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15441 00001916 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15442                                  
 15443                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15444                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15445                                  
 15446                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15447 00001918 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15448 0000191C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15449                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15450                                  					; ffOther
 15451 0000191E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15452 00001920 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15453                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15454                                  					; ff288
 15455 00001922 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15456 00001924 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15457 00001926 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15458                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15459                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15460 00001929 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15461                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15462                                  					; 2 sides
 15463                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15464 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15465 0000192D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15466                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15467                                  					; & head max
 15468                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15469 00001930 E9C6ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15471                                  
 15472                                  Is720K:
 15473                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15474 00001933 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15475                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15476 00001934 E98FED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15478                                  
 15479                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15480                                  ;dofloppy:
 15481                                  		;retn
 15482                                  
 15483                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15484                                  
 15485                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15486                                  
 15487                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15488                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15489                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15490                                  ;
 15491                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15492                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15493                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15494                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15495                                  ;
 15496                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15497                                  ;
 15498                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15499                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15500                                  
 15501                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15502 00001937 06                      		push	es
 15503 00001938 57                      		push	di
 15504                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15505                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15506 00001939 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15507                                  
 15508                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15509                                  
 15510                                  scan_bds:				
 15511 0000193D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15512 00001941 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15513                                  
 15514                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15515                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15516                                  
 15517 00001943 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15518                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15519                                  get_next_bds:				
 15520 00001947 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15521                                  					; go to	next bds
 15522 0000194A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15523 0000194D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15524 0000194F 5F                      		pop	di
 15525 00001950 07                      		pop	es
 15526 00001951 C3                      		retn
 15527                                  
 15528                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15529                                  
 15530                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15531                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15532                                  ;
 15533                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15534                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15535                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15536                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15537                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15538                                  
 15539                                  checkromchange:	
 15540                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15541                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15542 00001952 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15543                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15544                                  					; fchanged
 15545 00001957 C3                      		retn
 15546                                  
 15547                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15548                                  
 15549                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15550                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15551                                  ;
 15552                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15553                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15554                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15555                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15556                                  
 15557                                  resetchanged:	
 15558                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15559                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15560 00001958 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15561                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15562                                  					; ~fchanged
 15563 0000195D C3                      		retn
 15564                                  
 15565                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15566                                  
 15567                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15568                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15569                                  ;
 15570                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15571                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15572                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15573                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15574                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15575                                  
 15576                                  haschange:
 15577                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15578                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15579 0000195E 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15580                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15581                                  					; fchangeline
 15582 00001963 C3                      		retn
 15583                                  
 15584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15585                                  
 15586                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15587                                  
 15588                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15589                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15590                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15591                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15592                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15593                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15594                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15595                                  
 15596                                  ; set_volume_id
 15597                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15598                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15599                                  ;
 15600                                  ;   on entry:
 15601                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15602                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15603                                  ;
 15604                                  ;   on exit:
 15605                                  ;	carry clear:
 15606                                  ;	   successful call
 15607                                  ;	carry set
 15608                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15609                                  
 15610                                  set_volume_id:				
 15611 00001964 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15612 00001965 50                      		push	ax
 15613 00001966 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15614 00001969 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15615 0000196B E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15616 0000196E 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15617 00001970 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15618 00001973 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15619                                  setvret:				
 15620                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15621                                  		; cf = 0
 15622                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15623 00001976 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15624 00001977 5A                      		pop	dx
 15625 00001978 C3                      		retn
 15626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15627                                  
 15628                                  seterr:					
 15629 00001979 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15630 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15631 0000197B C3                      		retn
 15632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15633 0000197C 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15634                                  
 15635                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15636                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15637                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15638                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15639                                  
 15640                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15641                                  
 15642                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15643                                  
 15644                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15645                                  ;
 15646                                  ;   on entry:
 15647                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15648                                  ;
 15649                                  ;   on exit:
 15650                                  ;	carry clear
 15651                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15652                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15653                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15654                                  ;
 15655                                  ;	carry set:
 15656                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15657                                  
 15658                                  read_volume_id:
 15659 0000197E 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15660 0000197F 51                      		push	cx
 15661 00001980 53                      		push	bx
 15662 00001981 50                      		push	ax
 15663 00001982 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15664 00001983 57                      		push	di
 15665 00001984 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15666 00001985 07                      		pop	es
 15667 00001986 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15668 00001989 BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15669                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15670 0000198C B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15671 0000198F F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15672 00001991 5F                      		pop	di
 15673 00001992 07                      		pop	es
 15674 00001993 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15675                                  					; # of fats
 15676 00001997 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15677                                  					; sectors / fat
 15678 0000199B F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15679 0000199D 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15680                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15681                                  					;
 15682                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15683                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15684 000019A1 2EA3[7C19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15685                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15686                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15687 000019A5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15688                                  					; # root dir entries
 15689 000019A9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15690 000019AB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15691                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15692                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15693 000019AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15694                                  next_sec:
 15695 000019AE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15696 000019AF 2EA1[7C19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15697                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15698                                  					; get sector #
 15699 000019B3 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15700                                  					; sectors / track
 15701 000019B7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15702 000019B9 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15703                                  
 15704                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15705                                  
 15706 000019BB 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15707                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15708 000019BC 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15709 000019BE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15710 000019C0 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15711                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15712 000019C4 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15713 000019C6 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15714 000019C8 E83CEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15715                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15716 000019CB 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15717 000019CD B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15718 000019D0 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15719                                  fvid_loop:
 15720                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15721 000019D2 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15722                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15723 000019D4 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15724 000019D6 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15725 000019D9 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15726 000019DB 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15727 000019DE 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15728                                  ent_loop:
 15729 000019E0 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15730 000019E3 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15731 000019E5 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15732 000019E6 2EFF06[7C19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15733                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15734                                  					; next sector
 15735 000019EB E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15736                                  notfound:
 15737                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15738                                  		;xor	si, si
 15739 000019ED EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15740                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15741                                  
 15742                                  found_vid:
 15743                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15744                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15745 000019EF 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15746 000019F0 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15747 000019F2 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15748 000019F3 57                      		push	di
 15749 000019F4 1E                      		push	ds
 15750 000019F5 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15751 000019F6 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15752 000019F9 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15753                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15754 000019FC F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15755                                  		;xor	al, al
 15756                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15757 000019FE 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15758 000019FF AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15759                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15760                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15761                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15762 00001A00 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15763 00001A01 07                      		pop	es
 15764                                  fvid_ret:
 15765                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15766 00001A02 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15767                                  				
 15768 00001A04 58                      		pop	ax
 15769                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15770                                  		; cf = 0
 15771                                  		;clc
 15772                                  rvidret:
 15773 00001A05 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15774 00001A06 59                      		pop	cx
 15775 00001A07 5A                      		pop	dx
 15776 00001A08 C3                      		retn
 15777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15778                                  
 15779                                  no_vid:
 15780 00001A09 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15781                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15782                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15783 00001A0A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15784                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15785                                  
 15786                                  readviderr:
 15787 00001A0C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15788 00001A0D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15789 00001A0E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15790                                  
 15791                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15792                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15793                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15794                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15795 00001A10 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15796                                  		;
 15797                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15798                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15799                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15800                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15801 00001A13 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15802 00001A16 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15803                                  		;
 15804 00001A19 FC                      		cld
 15805 00001A1A C3                      		retn
 15806                                  
 15807                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15808                                  
 15809                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15810                                  ;
 15811                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15812                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15813                                  
 15814                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15815 00001A1B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15816                                  		;push	si
 15817 00001A1C 51                      		push	cx
 15818                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15819 00001A1D 56                      		push	si
 15820                                  
 15821                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15822                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15823                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15824                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15825                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15826                                  		;cld
 15827                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15828 00001A1E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15829                                  
 15830 00001A21 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15831                                  		
 15832                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15833 00001A23 5E                      		pop	si
 15834                                  chk_volid_ok:
 15835 00001A24 59                      		pop	cx
 15836                                  		;pop	si
 15837 00001A25 5F                      		pop	di
 15838 00001A26 C3                      		retn
 15839                                  
 15840                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15841                                  
 15842                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15843                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15844                                  ;
 15845                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15846                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15847                                  
 15848                                  check_volume_id:
 15849 00001A27 57                      		push	di
 15850 00001A28 51                      		push	cx
 15851                                  		
 15852                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15853                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15854                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15855                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15856                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15857                                  		;cld
 15858                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15859 00001A29 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15860                                  
 15861 00001A2C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15862                                  		
 15863                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15864                                  		;pop	cx
 15865                                  		;pop	di
 15866                                  		;retn
 15867 00001A2E EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 15868                                  
 15869                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15870                                  
 15871                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15872                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15873                                  ;
 15874                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15875                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15876                                  ;
 15877                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15878                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15879                                  ;
 15880                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15881                                  
 15882                                  fat_check:
 15883 00001A30 50                      		push	ax
 15884 00001A31 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15885 00001A33 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15886 00001A36 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15887                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15888 00001A3A 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15889 00001A3C 4E                      		dec	si
 15890                                  okret1:
 15891 00001A3D 58                      		pop	ax
 15892 00001A3E C3                      		retn
 15893                                  
 15894                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15895                                  
 15896                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS) ((& MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS)) ; 27/12/2023
 15897                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15898                                  
 15899                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15900                                  
 15901                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15902                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15903                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15904

 15906                                  
 15907                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15908                                  		;db 0
 15909                                  
 15910                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15911                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15912                                  
 15913                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15914 00001A3F 00                      		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15915                                  %endif
 15916                                  
 15917                                  ;align 16
 15918

 15920                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
