 31414                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31415                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 31416                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 31417                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 31418                                  ; A-F are considered valid if gnradix is 16.
 31419                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31420                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 31421                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 31422                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 31423                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 31424                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31425                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31426                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31427                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31428                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31429                                  
 31430                                  gnradix:
 31431 00002B6D 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 31432                                  
 31433                                  toDigit:
 31434 00002B6F 2E833E[6D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31435 00002B75 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 31436                                  
 31437                                  toDigit_hex:
 31438 00002B77 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 31439 00002B7A 7209                    	jb	short td10
 31440 00002B7C 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 31441 00002B7F 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'f' at all...
 31442 00002B81 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 31443                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31444 00002B84 C3                      	retn
 31445                                  td10:	
 31446 00002B85 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 31447 00002B88 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'? Not a letter...
 31448 00002B8A 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 31449 00002B8D 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'? Not a digit.
 31450 00002B8F 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 31451                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31452 00002B92 C3                      	retn
 31453                                  toDigit_dec:
 31454                                  td20:	
 31455 00002B93 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 31456                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 31457 00002B96 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 31458 00002B98 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 31459 00002B9B 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 31460 00002B9D 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 31461                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31462 00002BA0 C3                      	retn
 31463                                  tdE:	
 31464 00002BA1 F9                      	stc
 31465                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 31466 00002BA2 C3                      	retn
 31467                                  
 31468                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31469                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 31470                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31471                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 31472                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 31473                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 31474                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 31475                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31476                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31477                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31478                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31479                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31480                                  
 31481                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31482                                  
 31483                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31484                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 31485                                  
 31486                                  GetXNum:
 31487                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 31488                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31489                                  	;push	bx
 31490 00002BA3 51                      	push	cx ; *
 31491                                  	;push	ds
 31492                                  
 31493 00002BA4 FC                      	cld
 31494 00002BA5 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31495 00002BA7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 31496 00002BA9 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31497 00002BAB 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 31498                                  
 31499 00002BAD 2EC706[6D2B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 31500                                  
 31501 00002BB4 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 31502                                  	;call	toDigit
 31503 00002BB7 E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 31504                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 31505                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31506 00002BBA 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 31507                                  
 31508 00002BBC 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 31509 00002BBE 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 31510 00002BC0 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 31511 00002BC4 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 31512 00002BC7 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 31513 00002BC9 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 31514 00002BCC 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 31515                                  
 31516                                  gxn10:	
 31517 00002BCE 2EC706[6D2B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 31518 00002BD5 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 31519 00002BD6 46                      	inc	si
 31520                                  
 31521                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31522                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 31523                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 31524                                  ;        BX    = 0
 31525                                  ;        CH    = 0
 31526                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31527                                  
 31528                                  gxn20:	
 31529 00002BD7 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 31530 00002BDA 46                      	inc	si
 31531                                  
 31532 00002BDB E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 31533 00002BDE 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 31534                                  
 31535 00002BE0 E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 31536 00002BE3 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 31537                                  
 31538 00002BE5 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 31539 00002BE7 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 if last add wrapped
 31540                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 31541                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 31542 00002BE9 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 31543                                  gxnE:	
 31544                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 31545 00002BEB EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 31546                                  gxnQ:	
 31547 00002BED 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 31548 00002BEE F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 31549                                  gxnX:	
 31550                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31551                                  	;pop	ds
 31552 00002BEF 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 31553                                  	;pop	bx
 31554 00002BF0 C3                      	retn
 31555                                  
 31556                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31557                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 31558                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31559                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 31560                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 31561                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 31562                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31563                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31564                                  
 31565                                  mul32:
 31566 00002BF1 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31567 00002BF2 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31568 00002BF4 2EF726[6D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31569 00002BF9 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 31570                                  
 31571 00002BFB 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31572 00002BFD 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31573                                  
 31574 00002BFE 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31575 00002C00 2EF726[6D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31576 00002C05 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31577 00002C07 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31578 00002C09 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31579 00002C0B C3                      	retn
 31580                                  m32E:	
 31581 00002C0C 58                      	pop	ax
 31582 00002C0D C3                      	retn
 31583                                  
 31584                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31585                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 31586                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31587                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 31588                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 31589                                  ; ERROR:   None
 31590                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31591                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31592                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 31593                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 31594                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31595                                  
 31596                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31597                                  toPara:
 31598 00002C0E 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 31599                                  
 31600 00002C0F B104                    	mov	cl,4		;
 31601 00002C11 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 31602 00002C13 92                      	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 31603 00002C14 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31604 00002C16 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 31605 00002C18 09D0                    	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 31606                                  
 31607 00002C1A 59                      	pop	cx
 31608 00002C1B C3                      	retn

 31610                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31611                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31612                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31613                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31614                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31615                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31616                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31617                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31618                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 31619                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 31620                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 31621                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 31622                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31623                                  
 31624                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31625                                  UmbHead:

 31629                                  	;push	ds ; ?

 31632

 31635                                  
 31636 00002C1C B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31637 00002C1E CD21                    	int	21h
 31638                                  
 31639 00002C20 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 31640                                  	
 31641                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31642 00002C24 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh

 31666                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31667                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 31668                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31669                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 31670                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 31671                                  ; USES:   Flags
 31672                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31673                                  
 31674                                  isSysMCB:

 31684 00002C29 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 31685 00002C2F 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 31686                                  ism10:

 31694                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31695                                  
 31696                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31697                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31698                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31699                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31700                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31701                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31702                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31703                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31704                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31705                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31706                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31707                                  ;      ...
 31708                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31709                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31710                                  
 31711                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31712                                  AddrToUmb:
 31713                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31714                                  	;push	cx
 31715                                  	;push	dx
 31716 00002C39 06                      	push	es
 31717                                  
 31718 00002C3A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31719                                  
 31720 00002C3C E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31721 00002C3F 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31722                                  
 31723                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31724                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31725 00002C41 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31726                                  
 31727                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31728                                  atu10:
 31729 00002C43 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31730                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31731                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31732                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31733                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31734                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31735                                  
 31736                                  ;atu10:	
 31737                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31738 00002C45 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31739 00002C47 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31740                                  
 31741 00002C49 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31742 00002C4C 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31743                                  
 31744 00002C4E 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31745                                  atu20:	
 31746                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31747                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31748                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31749                                  	; ax = es
 31750                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31751 00002C4F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31752 00002C54 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31753 00002C5A 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31754                                  
 31755                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31756                                  
 31757                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31758                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31759                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31760 00002C5C 40                      	inc	ax
 31761                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31762                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31763 00002C5D EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31764                                  
 31765                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31766                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31767                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31768                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31769                                  
 31770                                  atu30:	
 31771                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31772                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31773                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31774                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31775 00002C5F 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31776 00002C61 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31777                                  atuE:	
 31778 00002C63 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31779 00002C65 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31780                                  atuX:	
 31781 00002C66 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31782                                  	
 31783 00002C68 07                      	pop	es	
 31784                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31785                                  	;pop	dx
 31786                                  	;pop	cx
 31787 00002C69 C3                      	retn
 31788                                  
 31789                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31790                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31791                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31792                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31793                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31794                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31795                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31796                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 31797                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31798                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31799                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31800                                  
 31801                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31802                                  convUMB:
 31803 00002C6A 2E833E[6D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31804 00002C70 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 31805 00002C72 E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 31806                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31807                                  	;jne	short cu10
 31808                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31809                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31810 00002C75 40                      	inc	ax
 31811 00002C76 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31812 00002C78 48                      	dec	ax
 31813                                  cu10:	
 31814 00002C79 C3                      	retn

 31874                                  	retn

 31878

 31885                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was

 32202                                  %endif

 32351                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32352                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32353                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32354                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32355                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32356                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32357                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32358                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32359                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32360                                  
 32361                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32362                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32363                                  findUMB:
 32364                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32365                                  	;push	ax
 32366                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32367 00002D42 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32368                                  	;push	dx
 32369                                  
 32370 00002D43 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32371                                  
 32372 00002D45 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32373                                  
 32374 00002D47 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32375                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32376                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32377 00002D4A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32378                                  
 32379                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32380                                  fu10:
 32381 00002D4C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32382                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32383                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32384                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32385                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32386                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32387                                  
 32388                                  ;fu10:	
 32389 00002D4E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32390 00002D50 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32391                                  
 32392 00002D52 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32393 00002D55 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32394                                  
 32395 00002D57 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32396                                  fu20:	
 32397                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32398                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32399                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32400 00002D58 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32401 00002D5E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32402                                  
 32403                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32404                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32405                                  	; ax = es
 32406                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32407                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32408 00002D60 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32409 00002D65 40                      	inc	ax
 32410                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32411                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32412 00002D66 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32413                                  fuE:	
 32414 00002D68 F9                      	stc
 32415                                  fuX:
 32416                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32417                                  	;pop	dx
 32418                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32419 00002D69 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32420                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32421 00002D6A C3                      	retn
 32422                                  
 32423                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32424                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32425                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32426                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32427                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32428                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32429                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32430                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32431                                  
 32432                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32433                                  BigFree:
 32434                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32435                                  	;push	bx
 32436 00002D6B 51                      	push	cx
 32437                                  
 32438 00002D6C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32439 00002D6F 723A                    	jc	short bfX
 32440                                  
 32441 00002D71 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32442 00002D73 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32443                                  
 32444                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32445                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32446                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32447                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32448                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32449                                  
 32450                                  bf10:	
 32451 00002D75 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32452 00002D78 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32453                                  
 32454                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32455 00002D7A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32456 00002D80 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32457                                  
 32458 00002D82 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32459                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32460 00002D86 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32461                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32462                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32463 00002D88 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32464                                  
 32465 00002D8A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32466                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32467 00002D8C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32468                                  bf20:	
 32469                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32470                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32471                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32472                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32473 00002D8E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32474 00002D94 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32475                                  
 32476                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32477 00002D96 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32478                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32479 00002D98 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32480 00002D9D 40                      	inc     ax
 32481 00002D9E 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32482                                  
 32483 00002DA0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32484                                  
 32485 00002DA2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32486 00002DA4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32487 00002DA6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32488 00002DA8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX
 32489                                  bfE:	
 32490 00002DAA F9                      	stc				; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32491                                  bfX:
 32492 00002DAB 59                      	pop	cx
 32493                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32494                                  	;pop	bx
 32495 00002DAC C3                      	retn
 32496                                  
 32497                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32498                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32499                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32500                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32501                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32502                                  ; ERROR:    None

 32511

 32516                                  	;

 32521                                  	;pop	ds
 32522                                  	
 32523                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 32524                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32525                                  	; ds = cs
 32526 00002DB1 8A87[1A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32527                                  
 32528 00002DB5 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32529

 32532                                  	;pop	ax
 32533                                  
 32534 00002DB7 C3                      	retn
 32535                                  
 32536                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32537                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32538                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32539                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32540                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32541                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32542                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32543                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32544                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32545                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32546                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32547                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32548                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32549                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32550                                  
 32551                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ 20h
 32552                                  
 32553                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32554                                  
 32555                                  shrinkMCB:
 32556                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32557                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32558                                  	;push	bx
 32559 00002DB8 51                      	push	cx
 32560 00002DB9 06                      	push	es
 32561                                  
 32562 00002DBA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32563                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32564                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32565                                  
 32566 00002DBC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32567                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32568 00002DC1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32569                                  
 32570 00002DC3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32571                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32572                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32573                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32574                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32575                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32576                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32577 00002DC6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32578 00002DC8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32579                                  
 32580 00002DCA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32581                                  	
 32582                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32583                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32584 00002DCF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32585                                  
 32586 00002DD1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32587 00002DD6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32588                                  
 32589 00002DDC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32590 00002DDE 40                      	inc	ax
 32591 00002DDF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32592                                  
 32593 00002DE1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32594 00002DE3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32595                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32596                                  	; ax > 0
 32597 00002DE5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32598                                  
 32599                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32600 00002DE6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32601                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32602 00002DEB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32603                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32604                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32605                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32606                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32607                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32608                                  
 32609                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32610 00002DEF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32611                                  
 32612                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32613                                  	; cf=0
 32614                                  	;clc
 32615                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32616                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32617                                  smE:	
 32618                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32619                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32620                                  	;stc
 32621                                  smX:	
 32622                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32623 00002DF2 07                      	pop	es
 32624 00002DF3 59                      	pop	cx
 32625                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32626                                  	;pop	bx
 32627 00002DF4 C3                      	retn
 32628                                  
 32629                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32630                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32631                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32632                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32633                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32634                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32635                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32636                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32637                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32638                                  ;
 32639                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32640                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32641                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32642                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32643                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32644                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32645                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32646                                  ;       Endif
 32647                                  ;    Endif
 32648                                  ; Endif
 32649                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32650                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32651                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32652                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32653                                  ;    ENDIF
 32654                                  ; ENDIF
 32655                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32656                                  
 32657                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32658                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32659                                  _hideUMB_:
 32660                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32661                                  	; ds = cs
 32662                                  
 32663                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32664                                  	;push	bx
 32665                                  	;push	dx
 32666 00002DF5 06                      	push	es
 32667                                  
 32668 00002DF6 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32669 00002DF8 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32670 00002DFB 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32671                                  
 32672 00002DFD 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32673 00002DFF E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32674 00002E02 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32675                                  
 32676 00002E04 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32677 00002E05 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32678 00002E07 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32679 00002E0A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32680                                  
 32681 00002E0B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32682 00002E0D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32683                                  
 32684 00002E0F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32685 00002E11 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32686                                  
 32687 00002E13 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32688 00002E15 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32689 00002E18 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32690                                  hu_10:	
 32691                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32692                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32693                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32694                                  ;isTiny:
 32695                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32696                                  	;or	al,al
 32697 00002E1A 800E[161F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32698 00002E1F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32699                                  
 32700 00002E21 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32701 00002E24 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32702                                  
 32703 00002E26 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es

 33212                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 33213                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF

 33222 00002F75 7522                    	jne	short ihm_x			     ; then check for HIDDEN
 33223

 33225                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h

 33230 00002F80 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 33231 00002F87 7510                    	jne	short ihm_x

 33333                                  
 33334                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33335                                  ;
 33336                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33337                                  ;
 33338                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33339                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33340                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33341                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33342                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33343                                  ;
 33344                                  ;	Output : none
 33345                                  ;
 33346                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33347                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33348                                  ;
 33349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33350                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33351                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33352                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33353                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33355                                  
 33356                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33357                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33358                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33359                                  InitDevLoad:
 33360                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33361                                  	;push	es ; *
 33362                                  
 33363                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33364                                  	; ds = cs
 33365 00002FD4 803E[6B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33366                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33367                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33368 00002FD9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33369                                  
 33370                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33371                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33372                                  ; %if 0
 33373                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33374 00002FDB 803E[5B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 33375                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33376 00002FE0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33377                                  
 33378                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33379                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33380                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33381                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33382                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33383                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33384                                  
 33385 00002FE2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33386                                  
 33387 00002FE5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33388 00002FE8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33389 00002FEB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33390 00002FEE 9C                      	pushf
 33391 00002FEF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33392 00002FF2 9D                      	popf
 33393                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33394                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33395                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33396 00002FF3 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33397                                  
 33398                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33399                                  
 33400                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33401                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33402                                  InitForConv:
 33403                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33404                                  	; ds = cs
 33405 00002FF5 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33406                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33407 00002FF8 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33408 00002FFA E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33409 00002FFD E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33410                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33411 00003000 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33412                                  					;  in low memory
 33413                                  InitForHi:
 33414                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33415                                  	; ds = cs
 33416                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33417                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33418                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33419 00003002 A1[611F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33420 00003005 8B16[5D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33421 00003009 0316[5F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33422 0000300D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33423                                  
 33424                                  InitForLo:
 33425                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33426                                  	; ds = cs
 33427                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33428 0000300F C606[6B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33429                                  initforlo_x:
 33430                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33431                                  	; ds = cs
 33432                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33433                                  					;  we are loading low
 33434                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = Start of Low memory
 33435                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33436 00003014 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33437 00003017 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33438                                  idl1:
 33439 0000301B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33440                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33441                                  	; ds = cs
 33442                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33443                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33444                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33445                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33446 0000301E A3[4F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33447 00003021 8916[511F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33448 00003025 C706[531F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33449 0000302B A3[551F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33450                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33451                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33452 0000302E C3                      	retn
 33453                                  
 33454                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33455                                  ;
 33456                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33457                                  ;
 33458                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33459                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33460                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33461                                  ;		   current UMB
 33462                                  ;
 33463                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33464                                  
 33465                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33466                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33467                                  	; ds = cs
 33468                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33469                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33470                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33471 0000302F A1[5F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33472 00003032 0306[5D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33473 00003036 2B06[611F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33474                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33475                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33476                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33477                                  	;stc
 33478                                  	;retn
 33479                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33480 0000303A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33481 0000303D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33482                                  spcinumb1:
 33483 0000303F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33484                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33485                                  	; ds = cs
 33486 00003040 3B06[4D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33487                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33488                                  spcinumb2:
 33489 00003044 C3                      	retn

 33491                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33492                                  ;
 33493                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33494                                  ;
 33495                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33496                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33497                                  ;
 33498                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33499                                  
 33500                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33501                                  ;
 33502                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33503                                  ;	push	ds
 33504                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33505                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33506                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33507                                  ;	pop	ds
 33508                                  ;
 33509                                  ;	inc	ax
 33510                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33511                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33512                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33513                                  ;	retn
 33514                                  
 33515                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33516                                  ;
 33517                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33518                                  ;
 33519                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33520                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33521                                  ;		 the device.
 33522                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33523                                  ;
 33524                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33525                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33526                                  ;	UMB.
 33527                                  ;
 33528                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33529                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33530                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33531                                  ;
 33532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33533                                  
 33534                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33535                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33536                                  
 33537                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33538                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33539                                  	; ds = cs
 33540 00003045 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33541 00003048 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33542 0000304B CD21                    	int	21h
 33543                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33544                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33545                                  
 33546 0000304D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33547                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33548                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33549 0000304F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33550                                  
 33551 00003051 4B                      	dec	bx
 33552                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33553                                  	; ds = cs
 33554 00003052 391E[4D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33555                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33556 00003056 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33557                                  
 33558 00003058 43                      	inc	bx
 33559                                  
 33560 00003059 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33561 0000305C CD21                    	int	21h
 33562 0000305E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33563                                  
 33564                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33565                                  	;dec	ax
 33566                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33567                                  	;
 33568                                  PrepareMark:
 33569 00003060 1E                      	push	ds
 33570 00003061 48                      	dec	ax
 33571 00003062 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33572 00003064 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33573 0000306A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33574 00003070 40                      	inc	ax
 33575 00003071 1F                      	pop	ds
 33576                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33577                                  	; ds = cs
 33578                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33579                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33580                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33581                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33582 00003072 891E[5F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33583 00003076 A3[5D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33584 00003079 A3[611F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33585                                  	;
 33586                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33587                                  	; cf=0
 33588                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33589 0000307C C3                      	retn
 33590                                  
 33591                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33592                                  %if 1
 33593                                  gufd_err:
 33594 0000307D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33595                                  gufd_error:
 33596 0000307F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33597 00003081 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33598 00003082 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33599                                  %endif
 33600                                  
 33601                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33602                                  %if 0
 33603                                  gufd_err:
 33604                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33605                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33606                                  	; ds = cs
 33607                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33608                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33609                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33610                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33611                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33612                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33613                                  	stc
 33614                                  	retn
 33615                                  %endif

 33618                                  ;
 33619                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33620                                  ;
 33621                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33622                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33623                                  ;
 33624                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33625                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33626                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33627                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33628                                  ;
 33629                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33630                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33631                                  ;
 33632                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33633                                  
 33634                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33635                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33636                                  
 33637                                  DevSetMark:
 33638 00003084 06                      	push	es
 33639                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33640                                  	;push	di
 33641 00003085 1E                      	push	ds
 33642 00003086 56                      	push	si
 33643 00003087 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33644 00003089 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33645 0000308F 40                      	inc	ax
 33646 00003090 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33647                                  
 33648                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33649                                  
 33650 00003094 50                      	push	ax			; save load address
 33651                                  	
 33652                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33653                                  	; ds = cs
 33654                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33655 00003095 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33656                                  
 33657 00003099 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33658 0000309B FC                      	cld
 33659                                  dsm_again:
 33660 0000309C AC                      	lodsb
 33661 0000309D 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33662 0000309F 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33663 000030A1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33664 000030A3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33665                                  isit_slash:
 33666 000030A5 3C5C                    	cmp	al,'\'
 33667 000030A7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33668 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33669 000030AB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33670                                  isit_null:
 33671 000030AD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33672 000030AF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33673 000030B1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33674                                  
 33675 000030B3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33676 000030B6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33677                                  dsm_next_char:
 33678 000030B9 AC                      	lodsb
 33679 000030BA 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33680 000030BC 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33681 000030BE 3C2E                    	cmp	al,'.'
 33682 000030C0 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33683 000030C2 AA                      	stosb
 33684 000030C3 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33685                                  blankout:
 33686 000030C5 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33687 000030C7 B020                    	mov	al,' '
 33688 000030C9 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33689                                  dsm_exit:
 33690 000030CB 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load address
 33691 000030CC 5E                      	pop	si
 33692 000030CD 1F                      	pop	ds
 33693                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33694                                  	;pop	di
 33695 000030CE 07                      	pop	es
 33696 000030CF C3                      	retn
 33697                                  
 33698                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33699                                  ;
 33700                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33701                                  ;
 33702                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33703                                  ;
 33704                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33705                                  ;
 33706                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33707                                  ;	in DevSize
 33708                                  ;
 33709                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33710

 34150                                  ;
 34151                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34152                                  ;
 34153                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34154                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34155                                  ;
 34156                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 34157                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34158                                  ;
 34159                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34160                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34161                                  ;
 34162                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34163                                  
 34164                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34165                                  
 34166                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34167                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34168                                  
 34169                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34170                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34171                                  GetHexNum:
 34172 00003208 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34173 0000320A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34174                                  ghn_next:
 34175 0000320C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34176 0000320F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34177 00003212 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34178 00003214 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34179 00003217 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34180 00003219 50                      	push	ax
 34181 0000321A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34182 0000321C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34183 0000321F 58                      	pop	ax
 34184                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34185 00003220 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34186 00003223 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34187 00003225 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34188                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34189                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34190 00003228 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34191                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34192                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34193                                  ghn_shift1:
 34194 0000322A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34195 0000322C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34196 0000322E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34197 00003230 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34198 00003232 46                      	inc	si
 34199 00003233 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34200                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34201 00003235 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34202 00003238 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34203 0000323B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34204 0000323F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34205                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34206                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34207                                  ghn_shift2:
 34208 00003241 F8                      	clc
 34209 00003242 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34210 00003244 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34211 00003246 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34212 00003248 F8                      	clc
 34213 00003249 C3                      	retn
 34214                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34215                                  ghn_err:
 34216                                  gnib_err:
 34217 0000324A F9                      	stc
 34218                                  ghn_ret:
 34219                                  gnib_ret:
 34220 0000324B C3                      	retn
 34221                                  
 34222                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34223                                  ;
 34224                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34225                                  ;
 34226                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34227                                  ;
 34228                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34229                                  ;
 34230                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34231                                  ;
 34232                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34233                                  
 34234                                  GetNibble:
 34235 0000324C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34236                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34237                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34238 0000324F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
