 34259                                  ;============================================================================
 34260                                  
 34261                                  ; 12/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34262                                  
 34263                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 34264                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34265                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 34266                                  
 34267                                  XMM_REQUEST_UMB	equ 10h
 34268                                  XMM_RELEASE_UMB	equ 11h
 34269                                  
 34270                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34271                                  
 34272                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34273                                  ;
 34274                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34275                                  ;
 34276                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34277                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34278                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34279                                  ;			; DS = data
 34280                                  ;
 34281                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34282                                  ;
 34283                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34284                                  ;
 34285                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34286                                  
 34287                                  umb_insert:
 34288 00003268 1E                      	push	ds
 34289                                  
 34290                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34291                                  	; ds = cs
 34292                                  
 34293                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34294 00003269 8E1E[7A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34295                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34296 0000326D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34297 00003271 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34298 00003273 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34299                                  ui_next:
 34300 00003275 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34301                                  					;    new block
 34302 00003277 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34303                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34304                                  					;    last
 34305 00003279 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34306 0000327F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34307                                  					; N: get next block
 34308 00003281 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34309                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34310 00003283 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34311 00003286 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34312                                  
 34313                                  ui_insert:
 34314 00003288 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34315 0000328A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34316                                  
 34317 0000328B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34318 0000328D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34319                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34320 0000328F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34321                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34322 00003294 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34323                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34324 0000329A 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34325                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34326 0000329E C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34327                                  
 34328                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34329                                  
 34330 000032A4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34331 000032A6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34332 000032AC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34333                                  					; mark as free
 34334 000032B3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34335                                  					; start & end of new block
 34336 000032B6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34337                                  
 34338                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34339                                  	
 34340 000032BB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34341 000032BD 43                      	inc	bx
 34342 000032BE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34343 000032C0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34344                                  
 34345                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34346                                  					; this block
 34347 000032C1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34348                                  	
 34349 000032C3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34350 000032C9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34351 000032D0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34352 000032D4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34353                                  
 34354 000032DB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34355                                  
 34356                                  ui_append:
 34357                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34358 000032DD 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34359 000032E2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34360                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34361                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34362                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34363 000032E8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34364                                  
 34365 000032EE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34366 000032F0 40                      	inc	ax
 34367 000032F1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34368                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34369 000032F3 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34370                                  
 34371 000032F5 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34372                                  
 34373 000032F7 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34374 000032FD 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34375 00003304 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34376 00003308 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34377                                  
 34378                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34379 0000330F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34380 00003311 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34381 00003317 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34382                                  					; mark as free
 34383 0000331E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34384 0000331F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34385                                  ui_done:
 34386                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34387 00003324 1F                      	pop	ds
 34388                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34389                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34390                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34391 00003325 C3                      	retn
 34392

 34395                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 34396                                  ;
 34397                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 34398                                  ;
 34399                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34400                                  
 34401                                  AllocUMB:
 34402                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34403                                  	; ds = cs
 34404 00003326 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 34405 00003329 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 34406                                  au_next:
 34407 0000332B E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 34408 0000332E 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 34409 00003330 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 34410 00003333 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 34411                                  au_coalesce:
 34412                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34413                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 34414                                  ;au_exit:
 34415                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 34416                                  ;	; ds = cs
 34417                                  ;	retn
 34418                                  
 34419                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34420                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34421                                  
 34422                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34423                                  
 34424                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34425                                  
 34426                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34427                                  ;
 34428                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34429                                  ;
 34430                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34431                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34432                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34433                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34434                                  ;
 34435                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34436                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34437                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34438                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34439                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34440                                  ;
 34441                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34442                                  
 34443                                  umb_coalesce:
 34444                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34445                                  	; ds = cs
 34446 00003335 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34447                                  
 34448 00003336 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34449                                  
 34450                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34451                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34452 00003338 8E06[7A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34453 0000333C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34454                                  uc_nextfree:
 34455 00003341 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34456 00003343 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34457                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34458 00003345 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34459 0000334A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34460                                  					; N: get next arena
 34461 0000334C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34462 0000334F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34463 00003351 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34464                                  uc_again:
 34465 00003353 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34466 00003356 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34467                                  uc_check:
 34468 00003358 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34469 0000335D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34470                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34471 0000335F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34472 00003364 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34473                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34474 00003365 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34475 00003369 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34476 0000336C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34477 0000336E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34478                                  
 34479                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34480                                  ;uc_done:
 34481                                  	;retn

 34494 00003375 B452                    	mov	ah,52h
 34495 00003377 CD21                    	int	21h			; get DOS DATA seg
 34496                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34497                                  	; ds = cs
 34498                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 34499 00003379 8C06[7A1F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 34500 0000337D B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 34501 00003380 CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 34502                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 34503                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 34504 00003382 891E[631F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 34505 00003386 8C06[651F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 34506                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34507 0000338A 803E[791F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 34508                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 34509                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 34510                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34511 0000338F 770A                    	ja	short ia_1 ; cf=0
 34512 00003391 E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 34513                                  	;jc	short iau_err
 34514                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34515 00003394 7207                    	jc	short iau_err2  ; cf=1
 34516                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34517                                  	; ds = cs
 34518 00003396 C606[791F]FF            	mov	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 34519                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 34520                                  ia_1:
 34521                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34522                                  	; cf=0
 34523                                  	;clc
 34524 0000339B C3                      	retn
 34525                                  iau_err:
 34526 0000339C F9                      	stc
 34527                                  iau_err2:
 34528 0000339D C3                      	retn
 34529                                  
 34530                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34531                                  ;
 34532                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34533                                  ;
 34534                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34535                                  ;
 34536                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34537                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34538                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34539                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34540                                  ;				NC
 34541                                  ;			  else 
 34542                                  ;				CY
 34543                                  ;
 34544                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34545                                  ;
 34546                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34547                                  
 34548                                  umb_allocate:
 34549                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34550                                  	; ds = cs
 34551 0000339E 50                      	push	ax
 34552 0000339F B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34553 000033A1 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 34554                                  					;   possible
 34555                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34556 000033A4 FF1E[631F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34557                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34558                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34559                                  					; the largest UMB
 34560 000033A8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34561 000033AA 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34562                                  	
 34563 000033AC B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34564                                  
 34565                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34566 000033AE FF1E[631F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34567                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34568                                  
 34569 000033B2 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 34570                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34571                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34572 000033B5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34573                                  ua_err:
 34574 000033B7 F9                      	stc	
 34575                                  
 34576                                  	;clc
 34577                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34578                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34579                                  	; cf=0
 34580                                  	;clc 
 34581                                  ua_done:
 34582 000033B8 58                      	pop	ax
 34583 000033B9 C3                      	retn
 34584                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34585                                  ;ua_err:
 34586                                  	;stc
 34587                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 34588                                  
 34589                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34590                                  ;
 34591                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34592                                  ;
 34593                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 34594                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34595                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 34596                                  ;
 34597                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34598                                  
 34599                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34600                                  get_next:
 34601 000033BA 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34602 000033BF 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 34603                                  _get_next_:
 34604 000033C1 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 34605 000033C3 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34606 000033C7 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34607 000033C8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34608                                  	;clc
 34609                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34610                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34611                                  	; cf=0
 34612                                  	;clc
 34613 000033CA C3                      	retn
 34614                                  gn_err:
 34615 000033CB F9                      	stc
 34616                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 34617                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 34618 000033CC C3                      	retn

 34620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34621                                  ;
 34622                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34623                                  ;
 34624                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34625                                  
 34626                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34627                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34628                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34629                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34630                                  	; ds = cs

 34633

 34635                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34636                                  
 34637                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34638                                  	; ds = cs
 34639                                  
 34640 000033D2 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 34641 000033D4 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34642 000033D6 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34643                                  
 34644 000033D8 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34645 000033DA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34646                                  
 34647 000033DC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34648                                  
 34649                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34650                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34651 000033DE 49                      	dec	cx
 34652 000033DF 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34653                                  	
 34654 000033E1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34655 000033E7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34656                                  					
 34657 000033EE 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34658 000033F2 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34659                                  
 34660                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 34661                                  
 34662 000033F9 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 34663 000033FB 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34664 00003401 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34665                                  					; mark as free 
 34666 00003408 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34667 00003409 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34668                                  
 34669                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34670                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34671 0000340E 8E06[7A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34672                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34673 00003412 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 34674                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34675                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34676                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34677                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34678                                  
 34679                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 34680                                  
 34681                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34682                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34683                                  	; 18/09/2023

 34685 0000341C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34686                                  ;scan_next
 34687                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34688                                  scannext:
 34689 0000341E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34690 00003422 740C                    	je	short got_last

 34694 0000342B 40                      	inc	ax

 34696                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34697                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34698 0000342E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34699                                  got_last:
 34700                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34701                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34702 00003430 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34703

 34705                                  	;clc
 34706                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34707                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34708                                  	; cf=0
 34709                                  	;clc
 34710 0000343B C3                      	retn
 34711                                  
 34712                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34713                                  ;;lfu_err:
 34714                                  ;	;stc

 34716                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 34717                                  ;	; cf=1
 34718                                  ;	;stc

 34721                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34722                                  ;
 34723                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34724                                  ;
 34725                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34726                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34727                                  ;
 34728                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34729

 34782 00003470 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34783 00003475 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34784                                  ulu_next:

 34786 0000347D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x

 34788 00003481 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 34799                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34800                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34801                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34802                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34803                                  
 34804                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34805                                  ;
 34806                                  ; Summary:
 34807                                  ;
 34808                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34809                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34810                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34811                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34812                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34813                                  ;
 34814                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34815                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34816                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34817                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34818                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34819                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34820                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34821                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34822                                  ;
 34823                                  ; Example:
 34824                                  ;
 34825                                  ;   [menu]
 34826                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34827                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34828                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34829                                  ;
 34830                                  ;   [network]
 34831                                  ;   include misc
 34832                                  ;   device=foo
 34833                                  ;
 34834                                  ;   [misc]
 34835                                  ;   device=bar
 34836                                  ;   include alternate
 34837                                  ;
 34838                                  ;   [alternate]
 34839                                  ;   device=tar
 34840                                  ;
 34841                                  ;
 34842                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34843                                  ;
 34844                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34845                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34846                                  ;
 34847                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34848                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34849                                  ;   following order:
 34850                                  ;
 34851                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34852                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34853                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34854                                  ;
 34855                                  
 34856                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34857                                  
 34858                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34859                                  
 34860                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34861                                  
 34862                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34863                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34864                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34865                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34866                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34867                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34868                                  
 34869                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34870                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34871                                  
 34872                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34873                                  
 34874                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34875                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34876                                  
 34877 0000348F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 35013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35014                                  ;
 35015                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35016                                  ;
 35017                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35018                                  ;
 35019                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35020                                  
 35021                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35022                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35023                                  
 35024                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35025                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35026                                  parseline:
 35027                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35028                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35029                                  
 35030                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35031                                  
 35032                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35033                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35034                                  
 35035                                  nextswtch:
 35036                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35037                                  	je	short done_line
 35038                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35039                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35040                                  
 35041                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35042                                  
 35043                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35044                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35045                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35046                                  	je	short getparm
 35047                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35048                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35049                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35050                                  swterr:
 35051                                  	retn
 35052                                  
 35053                                  getparm:
 35054                                  	call	check_switch
 35055                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35056                                  	jc	short swterr
 35057                                  getnext:
 35058                                  	call	getchr
 35059                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35060                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35061                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35062                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35063                                  ;swterr:
 35064                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35065                                  
 35066                                  done_line:
 35067                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35068                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35069                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35070                                  	jnz	short okay
 35071                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35072                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35073                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35074                                  	retn
 35075                                  
 35076                                  okay:
 35077                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35078                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35079                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35080                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35081                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35082                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35083                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35084                                  	; cf=0
 35085                                  	;clc
 35086                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35087                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35088                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35089                                  ;exitpl:
 35090                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35091                                  	; ds = cs
 35092                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35093                                  	retn
 35094                                  put_back:
 35095                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35096                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35097                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35098                                  
 35099                                  %endif

 35102                                  ;
 35103                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35104                                  ;
 35105                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35106                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35107                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35108                                  ; error.
 35109                                  ;
 35110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35111                                  
 35112                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35113                                  
 35114                                  err_swtch:
 35115 000034F1 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35116                                  err_check:
 35117 000034F3 F9                      	stc
 35118                                  err_chk:
 35119                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35120 000034F4 C3                      	retn
 35121                                  
 35122                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35123                                  
 35124                                  check_switch:
 35125 000034F5 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 35126                                  	;jc	short err_check
 35127 000034F8 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 35128 000034FA 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 35129 000034FC 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35130                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35131 000034FE 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35132 00003500 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 35133 00003502 77EF                    	ja	short err_check

 35138 00003506 07                      	pop	es

 35148                                  
 35149 0000350F F2AE                    	repne	scasb

 35152 00003512 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 35153

 35156 00003519 8B1E[4C49]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far

 35181 0000353F 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35182                                  
 35183                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35184                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35185                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35186

 35190

 35199                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35200                                  ;
 35201                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35202                                  ;
 35203                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35204                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35205                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35206                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35207                                  ;
 35208                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35209                                  
 35210                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35211                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35212                                  process_num:
 35213 00003540 850E[4C49]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35214 00003544 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35215                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35216 00003546 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35217                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35218 00003549 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35219 0000354B A2[4B49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35220                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35221                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35222                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35223                                  	; cf=0
 35224 0000354E C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35225                                  try_f:
 35226                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35227 0000354F F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35228                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35229 00003552 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35230                                  
 35231                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35232                                  
 35233                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35234 00003554 A2[2448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35235                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35236                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35237                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35238                                  	; cf=0
 35239 00003557 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35240                                  try_t:
 35241 00003558 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35242 0000355A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35243                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35244 0000355C F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35245                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35246 0000355F 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35247

 35305                                  	;pop	ds ; *

 35307                                  nextswtch:

 35314

 35328 0000358B 72F6                    	jc	short swterr

 35378                                  ;
 35379                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35380                                  ;
 35381                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35382                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35383                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35384                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35385                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35386                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35387                                  ;
 35388                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35389                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35390                                  ;
 35391                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35392                                  ;
 35393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35394                                  
 35395                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35396                                  
 35397                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35398                                  
 35399                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35400                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35401                                  
 35402                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35403                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35404                                  
 35405                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35406                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35407                                  	; ds = cs
 35408                                  
 35409 000035B4 06                      	push	es
 35410                                  
 35411 000035B5 0E                      	push	cs
 35412 000035B6 07                      	pop	es
 35413                                  
 35414 000035B7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35415 000035B9 8A1E[2448]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35416 000035BD 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35417 000035C0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35418                                  
 35419 000035C2 C706[2748]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35420                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35421                                  got_80:

 35423 000035CA 8BB7[CC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35424

 35441 000035DD 7406                    	jz	short see_heads

 35454                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 35455 000035EF A3[3948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 35456                                  
 35457                                  heads_not_altered:
 35458                                  
 35459                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35460                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35461                                  
 35462                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35463                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35464                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35465                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35466 000035F2 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35467 000035F5 A2[2C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35468                                  
 35469 000035F8 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35470                                  
 35471                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35472                                  
 35473                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35474                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35475 000035FA 8A3E[3448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35476                                  	
 35477                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35478                                  	; ax = 2
 35479 000035FE 3906[3948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35480                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35481 00003602 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediaid ; just use default if heads>2
 35482                                  
 35483 00003604 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35484                                  
 35485                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35486                                  
 35487 00003606 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35488                                  
 35489                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35490                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35491                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35492                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35493                                  
 35494                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35495                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35496                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35497                                  
 35498 00003608 833E[3748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35499 0000360D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35500 0000360F 833E[2748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35501 00003614 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35502                                  
 35503                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35504                                  
 35505 00003616 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35506                                  
 35507                                  ;	check for 320K
 35508                                  
 35509                                  not_144m:
 35510 00003618 833E[2748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35511 0000361D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35512 0000361F 833E[3748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35513 00003624 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35514                                  
 35515 00003626 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35516 00003628 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediaid
 35517                                  
 35518                                  only_one_head:
 35519                                  
 35520                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35521                                  
 35522 0000362A 803E[2448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35523 0000362F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35524                                  
 35525                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35526                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35527                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35528                                  
 35529 00003631 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35530 00003633 833E[3748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35531                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35532 00003638 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35533                                  
 35534 0000363A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35535                                  
 35536                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35537                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35538                                  
 35539                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35540                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35541                                  	; ax = 2
 35542 0000363C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35543 0000363D A2[2C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35544                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35545                                  
 35546                                  got_correct_mediaid:
 35547 00003640 881E[3448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35548                                  
 35549                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35550                                  
 35551 00003644 A1[2748]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35552 00003647 F726[3948]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35553 0000364B F726[3748]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35554 0000364F A3[3248]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35555 00003652 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35556                                  
 35557 00003653 C3                      	retn
 35558

 36103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36106                                  ;
 36107                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36108                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36109                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36110                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36111                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36112                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36113                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36114                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36115                                  ;
 36116                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36117                                  
 36118                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36119                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36120                                  
 36121                                  skip_comment:
 36122 0000385C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36123                                  
 36124                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36125                                  	; ds = cs	
 36126                                  
 36127 0000385E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36128                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36129 00003863 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36130                                  
 36131 00003865 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36132                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36133 0000386A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36134                                  
 36135 0000386C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36136                                  	
 36137 0000386F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36138                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36139 00003873 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36140                                  
 36141 00003875 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36142                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36143 0000387A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36144                                  
 36145 0000387C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36146                                  	
 36147 00003880 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36148                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36149 00003884 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36150                                  skip_cmmt:
 36151 00003886 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36152 00003888 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36153 0000388B 46                      	inc	si
 36154 0000388C 49                      	dec	cx
 36155 0000388D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36156 0000388F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36157                                  no_commt:
 36158 00003891 C3                      	retn

 36168                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36169                                  ;
 36170                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36171                                  ;
 36172                                  ;   INPUT
 36173                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36174                                  ;
 36175                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36176                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36177                                  ;
 36178                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36179                                  ;       All
 36180                                  ;
 36181                                  ;   HISTORY
 36182                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36183                                  ;
 36184                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36185                                  
 36186                                  kbd_read:
 36187 00003892 F606[EF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36188 00003897 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36189                                  
 36190 00003899 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36191 0000389A 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36192 0000389C 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36193                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36194                                  kbd_loop:
 36195 0000389E B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36196 000038A0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36197 000038A2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36198 000038A4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36199 000038A6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36200 000038A8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36201 000038AA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36202 000038AC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36203                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36204                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36205 000038AF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36206                                  
 36207 000038B4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36208 000038B6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36209                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36210 000038B8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36211                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36212 000038B9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36213 000038BB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36214 000038BD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36215 000038BF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36216 000038C1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36217 000038C3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36218 000038C4 43                              inc     bx
 36219                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36220 000038C5 800E[F346]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36221                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36222 000038CA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36223 000038CC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36224 000038CE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36225 000038D0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36226 000038D2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36227                                  
 36228                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36229 000038D4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36230 000038D7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36231                                  	
 36232 000038D9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36233 000038DC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36234                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36235 000038DE BA[874B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36236 000038E1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36237                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36238 000038E4 800E[F346]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36239 000038E9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36240                                  kbd_notf5:
 36241                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36242 000038EB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36243 000038EE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36244                                  
 36245 000038F0 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36246 000038F3 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36247                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36248 000038F5 BA[C54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36249 000038F8 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36250 000038FB B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36251 000038FD 881E[F346]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36252                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36253 00003901 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36254 00003903 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36255 00003905 C606[F946]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36256 0000390A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36257 0000390C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36258                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36259 0000390E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36260 00003911 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36261                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36262 00003913 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36263 00003916 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36264 00003917 C3                              retn			;
 36265                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36266 00003918 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36267 00003919 C3                              retn			;

 36269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36270                                  ;
 36271                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36272                                  ;
 36273                                  ;   INPUT
 36274                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36275                                  ;
 36276                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36277                                  ;       None
 36278                                  ;
 36279                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36280                                  ;       None
 36281                                  ;
 36282                                  ;   HISTORY
 36283                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36284                                  ;
 36285                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36286                                  
 36287                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36288                                  
 36289                                  set_numlock:
 36290                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36291                                  	;push	ax
 36292 0000391A 1E                              push    ds
 36293 0000391B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36294 0000391D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36295 0000391F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36296 00003922 2E3B06[624B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36297 00003927 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36298 00003929 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36299 0000392E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36300                                  not_off:
 36301 00003930 2E3B06[604B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36302 00003935 F9                              stc
 36303 00003936 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36304 00003938 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36305                                  set_done:
 36306 0000393D 1F                              pop     ds
 36307                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36308                                  	;pop	ax
 36309 0000393E C3                              retn
 36310                                  
 36311                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36312                                  
 36313                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36314                                  ;
 36315                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36316                                  ;
 36317                                  ;   INPUT
 36318                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36319                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36320                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36321                                  ;
 36322                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36323                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36324                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36325                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36326                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36327                                  ;
 36328                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36329                                  ;       All
 36330                                  ;
 36331                                  ;   NOTES
 36332                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36333                                  ;
 36334                                  ;   HISTORY
 36335                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36336                                  ;
 36337                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36338                                  
 36339                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36340                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36341                                  
 36342                                  menu_check:
 36343                                  
 36344                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36345                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36346                                  
 36347 0000393F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36348 00003940 56                              push    si              ;
 36349 00003941 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36350                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36351 00003943 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36352 00003946 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36353 00003948 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36354 0000394A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36355 0000394C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36356 0000394D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36357                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36358 0000394F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36359 00003951 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36360 00003953 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36361 00003955 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36362 00003957 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36363 0000395A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36364 0000395F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36365                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36366 00003961 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36367 00003963 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36368                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36369 00003965 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36370                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36371 00003968 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36372 0000396A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36373 0000396C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36374 0000396E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36375 00003970 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36376 00003973 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36377 00003975 3A06[A91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 36378 00003979 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36379 0000397B 800E[EF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36380 00003980 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36381                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36382 00003982 3A06[B51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 36383 00003986 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36384 00003988 800E[EF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36385 0000398D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36386                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36387 0000398F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36388 00003992 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36389                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36390 00003994 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36391 00003995 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36392                                  
 36393                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36394                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36395                                  
 36396 00003996 F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36397 0000399B 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36398                                  ;
 36399                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36400                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36401                                  ;
 36402 0000399D E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36403 000039A0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36404 000039A2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36405                                  
 36406                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36407                                  
 36408                                  menu_search:
 36409 000039A5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36410 000039A7 BF[3447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36411 000039AA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36412 000039AD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36413 000039AF C606[2C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36414 000039B4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36415                                  
 36416                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36417                                  
 36418                                  menu_color:
 36419 000039B7 51                      	push	cx              ;
