 36420 000039B8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36421                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36422                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36423                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36424 000039B9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36425 000039BC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36426 000039BF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36427                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36428                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36429                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36430                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36431 000039C1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36432 000039C3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36433 000039C6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36434 000039C8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36435 000039CB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36436 000039CE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36437                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36438                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36439 000039D0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36440 000039D2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36441 000039D4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36442                                  check_color:
 36443 000039D6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36444 000039D8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36445 000039DA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36446                                  set_color:
 36447 000039DD 8816[EA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36448 000039E1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36449 000039E2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36450 000039E3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36451                                  
 36452                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36453                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36454                                  
 36455                                  menu_found:
 36456 000039E6 C606[F446]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36457                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36458 000039EB C606[F846]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36459 000039F0 8026[F346]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36460                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36461 000039F5 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36462 000039F7 8916[F646]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36463                                  
 36464 000039FB E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36465                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36466                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36467                                  
 36468                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36469                                  
 36470                                  menu_process:
 36471 000039FE E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36472 00003A01 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36473 00003A03 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36474 00003A05 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36475 00003A07 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36476 00003A09 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36477 00003A0B 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 36478 00003A0D 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 36479 00003A0F 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 36480 00003A11 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 36481 00003A13 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 36482 00003A15 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 36483 00003A17 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 36484 00003A19 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36485 00003A1B 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 36486 00003A1D 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 36487 00003A1F 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36488 00003A21 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 36489 00003A24 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36490 00003A26 F9                              stc                     ;
 36491 00003A27 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 36492 00003A2A EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36493                                  menu_numlock:
 36494 00003A2C E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 36495 00003A2F EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36496                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 36497 00003A31 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 36498                                  
 36499                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36500                                  
 36501                                  menu_default:
 36502 00003A33 8936[F646]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 36503 00003A37 803E[F946]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36504 00003A3C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36505 00003A3E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 36506 00003A41 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36507 00003A43 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36508 00003A46 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 36509 00003A48 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 36510 00003A4A E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 36511 00003A4D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36512                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36513 00003A50 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36514 00003A52 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36515                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 36516 00003A54 881E[F846]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36517                                  timeout_skip:
 36518 00003A58 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36519                                  
 36520                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36521                                  
 36522                                  menu_item:
 36523                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 36524 00003A5A 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 36525 00003A5D 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 36526 00003A5F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 36527 00003A61 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 36528 00003A64 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 36529 00003A66 F9                              stc                     ;
 36530 00003A67 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 36531 00003A6A EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 36532                                  
 36533                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36534                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36535                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36536                                  
 36537                                  menu_itemfound:
 36538 00003A6C 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 36539 00003A6D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36540 00003A6F 8887[FA46]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 36541 00003A73 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 36542                                  
 36543                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 36544                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 36545                                  ;   description...
 36546                                  
 36547 00003A75 89B7[0447]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 36548 00003A79 89B7[1847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 36549 00003A7D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 36550 00003A7F E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 36551 00003A82 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36552 00003A84 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 36553 00003A87 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36554 00003A89 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 36555 00003A8B 89BF[1847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 36556                                  
 36557                                  menu_nextitem:
 36558 00003A8F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36559 00003A92 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36560                                  
 36561                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36562                                  
 36563                                  menu_getdefault:
 36564 00003A95 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36565 00003A97 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36566 00003A99 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36567 00003A9B E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36568                                  menu_valid:
 36569 00003A9E 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36570 00003AA0 8816[F546]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36571 00003AA4 8B3E[F646]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36572 00003AA8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36573 00003AAA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36574 00003AAC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36575                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36576 00003AAD 53                              push    bx              ;
 36577 00003AAE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36578 00003AB0 8BB7[0447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36579 00003AB4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36580 00003AB7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36581 00003AB8 06                              push    es              ;
 36582 00003AB9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36583 00003ABA E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 36584 00003ABD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36585 00003ABE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36586 00003ABF 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 36587 00003AC1 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36588 00003AC2 3A1E[F546]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 36589 00003AC6 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 36590                                  menu_nodefault:
 36591 00003AC8 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 36592                                  menu_setdefault:
 36593 00003ACA 881E[F446]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36594                                  
 36595                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36596                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36597                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36598                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36599                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36600                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36601                                  
 36602 00003ACE 803E[F846]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36603 00003AD3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 36604 00003AD5 F606[F346]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 36605 00003ADA 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 36606 00003ADC E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 36607                                  
 36608                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 36609                                  
 36610                                  menu_display:
 36611 00003ADF B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 36612 00003AE1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36613 00003AE3 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 36614 00003AE5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36615 00003AE7 06                              push    es              ;
 36616 00003AE8 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 36617 00003AEB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36618 00003AED 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36619 00003AF1 A3[F146]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 36620 00003AF4 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 36621 00003AF8 A2[F046]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 36622 00003AFB A1[EB46]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 36623 00003AFE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36624 00003B00 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 36625 00003B03 8A3E[EA46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 36626 00003B07 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36627                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36628 00003B09 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36629 00003B0E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36630                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36631 00003B10 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36632 00003B15 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36633 00003B17 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36634 00003B19 8A36[EE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36635                                  menu_clear:
 36636 00003B1D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36637 00003B1F 07                              pop     es              ;
 36638 00003B20 8836[EE46]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 36639 00003B24 BA[024C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 36640 00003B27 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 36641                                  
 36642 00003B2A F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36643 00003B2F 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 36644 00003B31 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36645 00003B35 8A36[EE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 36646 00003B39 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 36647 00003B3B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 36648 00003B3D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36649 00003B3F BA[504C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 36650 00003B42 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 36651 00003B45 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 36652 00003B47 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36653 00003B49 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 36654 00003B4C 8816[ED46]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 36655                                  
 36656                                  menu_nostatus:
 36657 00003B50 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 36658                                  menu_disploop:
 36659 00003B53 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 36660 00003B56 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 36661 00003B57 3A1E[F546]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 36662 00003B5B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36663                                  
 36664                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 36665                                  
 36666 00003B5D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 36667 00003B5F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36668 00003B61 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 36669 00003B64 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36670 00003B68 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 36671 00003B6A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36672                                  
 36673 00003B6C BA[3D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 36674 00003B6F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36675 00003B72 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36676 00003B75 BA[0E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36677 00003B78 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36678 00003B7B FF36[EF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36679 00003B7F 800E[EF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36680 00003B84 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36681 00003B87 8F06[EF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36682                                  
 36683                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36684                                  
 36685                                  menu_autoselect:
 36686 00003B8B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36687 00003B8E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36688 00003B90 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36689                                  menu_abort:
 36690 00003B93 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36691 00003B95 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36692                                  
 36693                                  normal_boot:
 36694 00003B98 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36695 00003B9B 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36696 00003B9D 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36697 00003BA1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36698 00003BA3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36699                                  
 36700                                  not_topmenu:
 36701 00003BA6 80BF[FA46]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36702 00003BAB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36703 00003BAD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36704 00003BAF 8BBF[0447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36705 00003BB3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36706 00003BB6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36707 00003BB8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36708 00003BBA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36709                                  
 36710                                  not_submenu:
 36711 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36712 00003BBF 8B9F[0447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36713                                  
 36714                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36715                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36716                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36717                                  
 36718                                  no_selection:
 36719 00003BC3 891E[F646]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36720 00003BC7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36721 00003BCB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36722 00003BCD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36723 00003BCE 8E1E[A614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36724 00003BD2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36725                                  
 36726                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36727                                  ;
 36728                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36729                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36730                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36731                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36732                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36733                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36734                                  ;
 36735                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36736                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36737                                  
 36738                                  copyblock_loop:
 36739 00003BD4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36740 00003BD5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36741 00003BD8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36742 00003BD9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36743                                  
 36744                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36745                                  
 36746                                  copyblock_begin:
 36747                                  
 36748                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36749                                  %if 0
 36750                                          push    ax              ;
 36751                                          push    cx              ;
 36752                                          push    si              ;
 36753                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36754                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36755                                          push    ds              ;
 36756                                          push    cs              ;
 36757                                          pop     ds              ;
 36758                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36759                                          pop     ds              ;
 36760                                          pop     di              ;
 36761                                          pop     si              ;
 36762                                          pop     cx              ;
 36763                                          pop     ax              ;
 36764                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36765                                  %endif
 36766                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36767 00003BDB 57                      	push	di
 36768 00003BDC BF[3947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36769 00003BDF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36770 00003BE2 5F                      	pop	di
 36771 00003BE3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36772                                  
 36773 00003BE5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36774 00003BE7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36775 00003BE9 57                              push    di              ;
 36776 00003BEA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36777 00003BEC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36778 00003BED 06                              push    es              ;
 36779 00003BEE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36780 00003BEF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36781 00003BF2 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36782 00003BF3 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36783                                  copyblock_check:
 36784 00003BF4 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36785 00003BF6 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36786 00003BF8 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36787 00003BFB EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36788                                  
 36789                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36790 00003BFD E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36791 00003C00 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36792 00003C03 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36793 00003C05 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36794 00003C07 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36795 00003C09 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36796 00003C0B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36797                                  ;
 36798                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36799                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36800                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36801                                  ;
 36802                                  move_config:
 36803 00003C0D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36804 00003C0F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36805                                  ;
 36806                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36807                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36808                                  ;
 36809                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36810 00003C10 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36811 00003C13 BE[2C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36812 00003C16 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36813                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36814                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36815                                  copy_boot: 
 36816                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36817 00003C17 2E                              cs
 36818 00003C18 AC                      	lodsb
 36819 00003C19 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36820 00003C1B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36821 00003C1C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36822                                  
 36823 00003C1E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36824                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36825                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36826 00003C1F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36827 00003C21 2E8B36[F646]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36828 00003C26 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36829 00003C28 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36830 00003C2A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36831 00003C2B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36832 00003C2C BE[3947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36833 00003C2F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36834 00003C32 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36835 00003C35 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36836 00003C37 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36837 00003C39 46                              inc     si              ;
 36838 00003C3A 47                              inc     di              ;
 36839 00003C3B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36840 00003C3D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36841 00003C40 07                              pop     es              ;
 36842                                  
 36843                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36844                                  
 36845 00003C41 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36846 00003C43 2E893E[A414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36847 00003C48 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36848 00003C4A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36849                                  
 36850 00003C4B 51                              push    cx              ;
 36851 00003C4C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36852 00003C4E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36853 00003C4F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36854 00003C51 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36855                                  
 36856                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36857                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36858                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36859                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36860                                  ;   is empty.
 36861                                  
 36862 00003C52 06                              push    es              ;
 36863 00003C53 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36864 00003C55 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36865 00003C56 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36866 00003C5C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36867 00003C5F 07                              pop     es
 36868                                  
 36869                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36870                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36871                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36872                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36873                                  
 36874                                  menu_done:
 36875 00003C60 803E[EB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36876 00003C65 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36877 00003C67 06                              push    es              ;
 36878 00003C68 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36879 00003C6B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36880 00003C6D A1[F146]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36881 00003C70 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36882 00003C74 A0[F046]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36883 00003C77 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36884 00003C7B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36885                                  menu_exit:
 36886 00003C7C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36887 00003C80 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36888                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36889                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36890                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36891                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36892 00003C84 C3                      	retn
 36893                                  
 36894                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36895                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36896                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36897                                  
 36898                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36899                                  ;
 36900                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36901                                  ;
 36902                                  ;   INPUT
 36903                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36904                                  ;
 36905                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36906                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36907                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36908                                  ;
 36909                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36910                                  ;       None
 36911                                  ;
 36912                                  ;   NOTES
 36913                                  ;       None
 36914                                  ;
 36915                                  ;   HISTORY
 36916                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36917                                  ;
 36918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36919                                  
 36920                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36921                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36922                                  
 36923                                  copy_envvar:
 36924 00003C85 51                              push    cx              ;
 36925 00003C86 56                              push    si              ;
 36926 00003C87 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36927 00003C88 06                              push    es              ;
 36928 00003C89 06                              push    es              ;
 36929 00003C8A 8E06[A614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36930 00003C8E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36931                                  
 36932                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36933                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36934                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36935                                  ;
 36936                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36937                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36938                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36939                                  
 36940 00003C8F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36941                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36942 00003C91 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36943 00003C92 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36944                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36945 00003C94 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36946 00003C96 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36947                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36948 00003C98 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36949 00003C9A 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36950                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36951 00003C9C 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36952 00003C9E 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36953 00003C9F 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36954 00003CA1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36955 00003CA3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36956 00003CA5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36957 00003CA7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36958 00003CA9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36959 00003CAA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36960                                  copy_varsrch:
 36961 00003CAC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36962 00003CAF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36963 00003CB1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36964 00003CB3 51                              push    cx              ;
 36965 00003CB4 56                              push    si              ;
 36966 00003CB5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36967 00003CB7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36968 00003CB8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36969 00003CB9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36970 00003CBB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36971 00003CBF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36972                                  
 36973                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36974                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36975                                  
 36976 00003CC1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36977 00003CC4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36978 00003CC6 56                              push    si              ;
 36979 00003CC7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36980 00003CC9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36981 00003CCB 2E8B0E[A414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36982 00003CD0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36983                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36984                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36985                                  
 36986 00003CD2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36987 00003CD3 26                      	es	; 26h
 36988 00003CD4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36989                                  
 36990 00003CD5 5E                      	pop     si
 36991                                  copy_envprep:
 36992 00003CD6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36993 00003CD9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36994 00003CDB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36995 00003CDE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36996                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36997                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36998                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36999 00003CE0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37000 00003CE1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37001 00003CE3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37002 00003CE5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37003 00003CE7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37004 00003CE9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37005 00003CEA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37006                                  
 37007                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37008 00003CEC 51                              push    cx              ;
 37009 00003CED B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37010 00003CF0 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37011 00003CF2 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37012 00003CF3 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37013                                  
 37014                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37015                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37016                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37017                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37018                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37019                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37020                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37021                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37022                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37023                                  
 37024                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37025 00003CF5 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37026 00003CF7 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37027                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37028 00003CF8 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37029 00003CFB 2E893E[A414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37030                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37031 00003D00 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37032                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37033 00003D01 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37034 00003D02 07                              pop     es              ;
 37035 00003D03 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37036 00003D04 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37037 00003D05 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37038                                  
 37039                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37040 00003D06 C3                              retn
 37041                                  
 37042                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37043                                  ;
 37044                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37045                                  ;
 37046                                  ;   INPUT
 37047                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37048                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37049                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37050                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37051                                  ;
 37052                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37053                                  ;       Same as above
 37054                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37055                                  ;
 37056                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37057                                  ;       All
 37058                                  ;
 37059                                  ;   NOTES
 37060                                  ;       None
 37061                                  ;
 37062                                  ;   HISTORY
 37063                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37064                                  ;
 37065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37066                                  
 37067                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37068                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37069                                  
 37070                                  copy_block:
 37071 00003D07 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37072 00003D0A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37073 00003D0C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37074 00003D0E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37075 00003D10 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37076                                  
 37077 00003D12 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37078 00003D14 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37079 00003D16 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37080                                  
 37081                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37082                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37083                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37084                                  
 37085 00003D18 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37086 00003D1D 57                              push    di              ;
 37087                                  
 37088 00003D1E BF[3447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37089 00003D21 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37090 00003D24 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37091                                  
 37092 00003D26 BF[3947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37093 00003D29 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37094 00003D2C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37095                                  
 37096 00003D2E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37097 00003D30 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37098 00003D33 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37099                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37100                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37101 00003D35 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37102 00003D37 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37103 00003D38 51                              push    cx              ;
 37104 00003D39 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37105 00003D3B 56                              push    si              ;
 37106 00003D3C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37107 00003D3D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37108 00003D3F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37109 00003D42 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37110 00003D45 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37111 00003D46 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37112 00003D47 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37113 00003D49 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37114                                  
 37115                                  copy_error:
 37116                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37117 00003D4B F8                      	clc
 37118                                  copy_skip:
 37119 00003D4C 5F                              pop     di
 37120                                  ;copy_error:
 37121                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37122                                  	;clc                    ;
 37123 00003D4D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37124 00003D50 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37125                                  
 37126                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37127                                  
 37128                                  copy_line:
 37129 00003D52 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37130 00003D54 47                              inc     di              ;
 37131 00003D55 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37132 00003D57 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37133 00003D59 2E803E[A914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37134 00003D5F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37135 00003D61 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37136 00003D64 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37137 00003D66 47                              inc     di              ;
 37138 00003D67 47                              inc     di              ;
 37139 00003D68 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37140                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37141 00003D6A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37142 00003D6D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37143 00003D6F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37144 00003D71 47                              inc     di              ;
 37145                                  copy_next:
 37146 00003D72 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37147 00003D74 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37148                                  
 37149                                  copy_nextline:
 37150 00003D76 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37151 00003D79 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37152                                  
 37153                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37154                                  ;copy_done:
 37155                                          ;retn
 37156                                  
 37157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37158                                  ;
 37159                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37160                                  ;
 37161                                  ;   INPUT
 37162                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37163                                  ;
 37164                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37165                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37166                                  ;
 37167                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37168                                  ;       DX
 37169                                  ;
 37170                                  ;   NOTES
 37171                                  ;       None
 37172                                  ;
 37173                                  ;   HISTORY
 37174                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37175                                  ;
 37176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37177                                  
 37178                                  get_linenum:
 37179 00003D7B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37180 00003D7C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37181 00003D7E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37182 00003D7F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37183 00003D81 56                              push    si              ;
 37184 00003D82 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37185 00003D87 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37186                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37187 00003D89 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37188 00003D8C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37189 00003D8E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37190 00003D8F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37191 00003D91 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37192                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37193 00003D93 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37194 00003D94 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37195 00003D95 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37196 00003D96 C3                              retn
 37197                                  
 37198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37199                                  ;
 37200                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37201                                  ;
 37202                                  ;   INPUT
 37203                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37204                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37205                                  ;
 37206                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37207                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37208                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37209                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37210                                  ;
 37211                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37212                                  ;       None
 37213                                  ;
 37214                                  ;   NOTES
 37215                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37216                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37217                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37218                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37219                                  ;
 37220                                  ;   HISTORY
 37221                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37222                                  ;
 37223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37224                                  
 37225                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37226 00003D97 50                              push    ax              ;
 37227 00003D98 51                              push    cx              ;
 37228 00003D99 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37229 00003D9E 56                              push    si              ;
 37230 00003D9F 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37231 00003DA1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37232 00003DA2 06                              push    es              ;
 37233 00003DA3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37234 00003DA4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37235 00003DA7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37236 00003DA9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37237 00003DAB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37238 00003DAC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37239 00003DAD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37240 00003DAE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37241                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37242 00003DAF C3                              retn			;
 37243                                  
 37244                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37245                                  ;
 37246                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37247                                  ;
 37248                                  ;   INPUT
 37249                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37250                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37251                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37252                                  ;
 37253                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37254                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37255                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37256                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37257                                  ;
 37258                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37259                                  ;       AX
 37260                                  ;
 37261                                  ;   NOTES
 37262                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37263                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37264                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37265                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37266                                  ;
 37267                                  ;   HISTORY
 37268                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37269                                  ;
 37270                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37271                                  
 37272                                  find_block:
 37273 00003DB0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37274 00003DB3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37275 00003DB5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37276 00003DB7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37277 00003DB9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37278 00003DBB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37279 00003DBD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37280 00003DBF 2E800E[A914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37281 00003DC5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37282                                  check_line:
 37283 00003DC7 2E800E[A914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37284 00003DCD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37285 00003DD0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37286                                  next_line:
 37287 00003DD2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37288 00003DD5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37289                                  ;find_exit:
 37290                                  ;	retn
 37291                                  
 37292                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37293                                  ;
 37294                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37295                                  ;
 37296                                  ;   INPUT
 37297                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37298                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37299                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37300                                  ;
 37301                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37302                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37303                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37304                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37305                                  ;
 37306                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37307                                  ;       AX
 37308                                  ;
 37309                                  ;   NOTES
 37310                                  ;       None
 37311                                  ;
 37312                                  ;   HISTORY
 37313                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37314                                  ;
 37315                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37316                                  
 37317                                  comp_names:
 37318 00003DD7 57                              push    di              ;
 37319                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37320 00003DD8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37321 00003DDB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37322 00003DDD E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37323 00003DE0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37324 00003DE2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37325 00003DE4 47                              inc     di              ;
 37326 00003DE5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37327                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37328 00003DE8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37329 00003DEA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37330 00003DEC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37331                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37332 00003DED 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37333 00003DEE C3                              retn			;
 37334                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37335 00003DEF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37336 00003DF1 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37337 00003DF4 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37338 00003DF6 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37339                                  
 37340                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37341                                  
 37342                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37343                                  comp_names_x:
 37344                                  	;
 37345                                  comp_names_safe:
 37346 00003DF8 50                              push    ax
 37347 00003DF9 51                              push    cx
 37348 00003DFA 56                              push	si
 37349 00003DFB 1E                              push    ds
 37350 00003DFC 0E                              push    cs
 37351 00003DFD 1F                              pop     ds
 37352 00003DFE E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37353 00003E01 1F                              pop     ds
 37354 00003E02 5E                      	pop	si
 37355 00003E03 59                              pop     cx
 37356 00003E04 58                              pop     ax
 37357 00003E05 C3                              retn
 37358                                  
 37359                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37360                                  ;
 37361                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 37362                                  ;
 37363                                  ;   INPUT
 37364                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37365                                  ;
 37366                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37367                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37368                                  ;
 37369                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37370                                  ;       None
 37371                                  ;
 37372                                  ;   NOTES
 37373                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37374                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37375                                  ;
 37376                                  ;   HISTORY
 37377                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37378                                  ;
 37379                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37380                                  
 37381                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37382                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37383                                  
 37384                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37385 00003E06 50                              push    ax              ;
 37386 00003E07 53                              push    bx              ;
 37387 00003E08 51                              push    cx              ;
 37388 00003E09 52                              push    dx              ;
 37389 00003E0A 56                              push    si              ;
 37390 00003E0B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37391 00003E0D 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37392 00003E11 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37393 00003E13 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37394 00003E14 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37395 00003E16 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37396 00003E18 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37397 00003E1B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37398 00003E1D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37399 00003E1F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37400 00003E21 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37401 00003E23 8A26[EA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37402 00003E27 3A1E[F446]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37403 00003E2B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37404 00003E2D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37405 00003E30 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37406 00003E32 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37407 00003E34 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37408 00003E36 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37409 00003E38 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37410 00003E3A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37411                                  print_other:                    ;
 37412 00003E3D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37413 00003E3F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37414 00003E41 8BBF[1847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37415 00003E45 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37416 00003E47 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37417 00003E4B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37418 00003E4D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37419 00003E50 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37420 00003E52 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37421 00003E54 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37422 00003E56 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37423                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37424 00003E58 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37425 00003E5B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37426 00003E5D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37427 00003E5F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37428 00003E61 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37429                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37430 00003E63 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37431 00003E66 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37432 00003E68 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37433 00003E6A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37434 00003E6C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37435 00003E6E 06                              push    es              ;
 37436                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37437 00003E6F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37438 00003E72 47                              inc     di              ;
 37439 00003E73 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37440 00003E75 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37441 00003E77 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37442                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37443 00003E79 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37444 00003E7B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37445 00003E7D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37446 00003E7F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37447 00003E81 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37448 00003E83 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37449 00003E85 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37450 00003E87 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37451 00003E8A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37452 00003E8C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37453 00003E8E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37454 00003E90 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37455                                  print_done:                     ;
 37456 00003E92 07                              pop     es              ;
 37457 00003E93 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37458 00003E94 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37459 00003E96 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37460 00003E98 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37461 00003E99 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37462 00003E9A 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37463 00003E9B 5B                              pop     bx              ;
