 37464 00003E9C 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37465 00003E9D C3                              retn			;
 37466                                  
 37467                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37468                                  ;
 37469                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37470                                  ;
 37471                                  ;   INPUT
 37472                                  ;       None
 37473                                  ;
 37474                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37475                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37476                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37477                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37478                                  ;
 37479                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37480                                  ;       None
 37481                                  ;
 37482                                  ;   NOTES
 37483                                  ;       None
 37484                                  ;
 37485                                  ;   HISTORY
 37486                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37487                                  ;
 37488                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37489                                  
 37490                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37491 00003E9E 8A1E[F446]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37492 00003EA2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37493 00003EA4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37494 00003EA7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37495 00003EAA 803E[F846]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37496 00003EAF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37497 00003EB1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37498 00003EB3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37499 00003EB5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37500                                  check_time:
 37501 00003EB7 A0[F846]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37502 00003EBA 2A06[F946]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37503 00003EBE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37504 00003EC0 800E[F346]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 37505 00003EC5 C606[F946]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37506 00003ECA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37507                                  show_time:
 37508 00003ECD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37509 00003ECE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37510 00003ED0 8A3E[EB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37511 00003ED4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37512 00003ED6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37513 00003ED8 52                              push    dx              ;
 37514 00003ED9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37515 00003EDC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37516 00003EDE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37517 00003EE0 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37518 00003EE3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37519 00003EE6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37520 00003EE8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37521 00003EE9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37522 00003EEB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37523 00003EED 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37524 00003EEF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37525 00003EF1 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37526 00003EF3 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit

 37535                                  input_key:

 37758                                  ;
 37759                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37760                                  ;
 37761                                  ;   INPUT
 37762                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37763                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37764                                  ;
 37765                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37766                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37767                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37768                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37769                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37770                                  ;
 37771                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37772                                  ;       AX
 37773                                  ;
 37774                                  ;   NOTES
 37775                                  ;       None
 37776                                  ;
 37777                                  ;   HISTORY
 37778                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37779                                  ;
 37780                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37781                                  
 37782                                  skip_token:
 37783 0000402B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37784 0000402E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37785 00004030 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37786 00004033 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37787                                  skip_check_eol:
 37788 00004035 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37789 00004037 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37790 00004039 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37791 0000403B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37792 0000403D F8                              clc
 37793                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37794 0000403E C3                      	retn
 37795                                  skip_token_eol:
 37796 0000403F F9                              stc
 37797                                  skip_token_done:
 37798 00004040 C3                              retn
 37799                                  
 37800                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37801                                  ;
 37802                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37803                                  ;
 37804                                  ;   INPUT
 37805                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37806                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37807                                  ;
 37808                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37809                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37810                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37811                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37812                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37813                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37814                                  ;
 37815                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37816                                  ;       AX
 37817                                  ;
 37818                                  ;   NOTES
 37819                                  ;       None
 37820                                  ;
 37821                                  ;   HISTORY
 37822                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37823                                  ;
 37824                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37825                                  
 37826                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37827 00004041 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37828 00004044 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37829 00004047 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37830 00004049 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37831 0000404C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37832 0000404E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37833                                  
 37834                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37835                                  ;
 37836                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37837                                  ;
 37838                                  ;   INPUT
 37839                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37840                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37841                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37842                                  ;
 37843                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37844                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37845                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37846                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37847                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37848                                  ;
 37849                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37850                                  ;       AX
 37851                                  ;
 37852                                  ;   NOTES
 37853                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37854                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37855                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37856                                  ;
 37857                                  ;   HISTORY
 37858                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37859                                  ;
 37860                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37861                                  
 37862                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37863                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37864                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37865                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37866                                       
 37867                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37868                                  
 37869                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37870                                  ;
 37871                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37872                                  ;
 37873                                  ;   INPUT
 37874                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37875                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37876                                  ;
 37877                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37878                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37879                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37880                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37881                                  ;
 37882                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37883                                  ;       AX
 37884                                  ;
 37885                                  ;   NOTES
 37886                                  ;       None
 37887                                  ;
 37888                                  ;   HISTORY
 37889                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37890                                  ;
 37891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37892

 37899                                  skip_line_done:
 37900                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37901 00004059 C3                              retn

 37904                                  ;

 37906                                  ;

 37955                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37956                                  ;
 37957                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37958                                  ;
 37959                                  ;   INPUT
 37960                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37961                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37962                                  ;
 37963                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37964                                  ;       AL == next character
 37965                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37966                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37967                                  ;
 37968                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37969                                  ;       AX
 37970                                  ;
 37971                                  ;   NOTES
 37972                                  ;       None
 37973                                  ;
 37974                                  ;   HISTORY
 37975                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37976                                  ;
 37977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37978                                  
 37979                                  get_char:
 37980 0000407B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37981 0000407E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37982                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37983 00004080 26                      	es	
 37984 00004081 AC                      	lodsb
 37985 00004082 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37986 00004084 C3                              retn			;
 37987                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37988 00004085 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37989                                  nearby_ret:
 37990 00004088 C3                              retn

 37992                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37993                                  ;
 37994                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37995                                  ;
 37996                                  ;   INPUT
 37997                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37998                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37999                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38000                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38001                                  ;
 38002                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38003                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38004                                  ;
 38005                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38006                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38007                                  ;
 38008                                  ;   NOTES
 38009                                  ;       None
 38010                                  ;
 38011                                  ;   HISTORY
 38012                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38013                                  ;
 38014                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38015                                  
 38016                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38017                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38018                                  
 38019                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38020                                  query_user:
 38021 00004089 F606[F346]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38022                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38023 0000408E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38024 00004090 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38025                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38026                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38027                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38028                                  qu_1:
 38029 00004093 F606[F346]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38030 00004098 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38031 0000409A 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38032 0000409B A0[A814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38033 0000409E F606[F346]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38034 000040A3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38035 000040A5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38036                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38037 000040A7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38038                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38039                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38040                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38041                                  
 38042                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38043 000040A9 58                      	pop	ax
 38044 000040AA C3                      	retn
 38045                                  
 38046                                  query_all:
 38047                                  
 38048                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38049                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38050                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38051                                  
 38052 000040AB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38053 000040AC BA[024D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38054 000040AF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38055 000040B1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38056                                  
 38057 000040B3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38058 000040B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38059 000040B7 BF[4047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38060                                  find_match:                             ;
 38061 000040BA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38062 000040BC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38063 000040BE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38064 000040C0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38065 000040C1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38066 000040C3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38067 000040C5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38068                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38069 000040C8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38070                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38071 000040CA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38072 000040CD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38073 000040CF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38074                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38075 000040D1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38076 000040D3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38077 000040D4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38078 000040D6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38079 000040D8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38080 000040DA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38081 000040DC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38082 000040DF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38083 000040E1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38084                                  cmd_notset:
 38085 000040E3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38086                                  line_print:                             ;
 38087                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38088 000040E5 26                              es
 38089 000040E6 AC                      	lodsb
 38090 000040E7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38091 000040E9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38092 000040EB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38093                                  non_null:                               ;
 38094 000040ED 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38095 000040EF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38096 000040F1 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38097                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38098 000040F3 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38099                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38100 000040F6 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38101                                  non_space:                              ;
 38102 000040F8 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38103 000040FA B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38104 000040FC CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38105 000040FE EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38106                                  
 38107                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38108 00004100 BA[A04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38109                                  
 38110                                  generic_prompt:
 38111 00004103 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38112                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38113 00004106 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38114 00004108 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38115 0000410A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38116 0000410C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38117 0000410E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38118 00004111 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38119 00004113 A0[AC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 38120 00004116 800E[F346]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38121 0000411B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38122                                  not_func:
 38123 0000411D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38124 0000411F 3A06[AC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38125 00004123 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38126 00004125 3A06[A84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38127 00004129 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38128 0000412B 803E[A814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38129 00004130 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38130 00004132 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38131 00004134 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38132 00004136 800E[F346]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38133 0000413B A0[A84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38134                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38135 0000413E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38136 00004141 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38137                                  
 38138 00004142 3A06[AC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38139 00004146 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38140                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38141 00004148 F8                      	clc
 38142                                  do_cmd:
 38143 00004149 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38144                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38145                                  	; cf=0
 38146                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38147 0000414A C3                      	retn
 38148                                  
 38149                                  skip_cmd:
 38150 0000414B 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38151                                  skip_all:
 38152 0000414C B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38153 0000414E F9                      	stc
 38154 0000414F C3                      	retn

 38182 00004153 52                              push    dx

 38200                                  pe_1:

 38206 00004180 59                              pop     cx

 38209 00004183 C3                      	retn
 38210                                  
 38211                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38212                                  
 38213                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38214                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38215                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38216                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38217                                  
 38218                                  disable_autoexec:
 38219                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38220                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38221                                  
 38222 00004184 F606[F346]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38223 00004189 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38224 0000418B F606[E946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38225 00004190 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38226 00004192 800E[E946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38227                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38228 00004197 810E[F346]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38229 0000419D BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38230                                  dae_1:
 38231                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38232 000041A0 A0[2846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38233                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38234 000041A3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38235 000041A5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38236 000041A7 8A1E[2946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38237 000041AB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38238 000041AD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38239 000041AF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38240 000041B2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38241 000041B5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38242 000041B7 881E[2946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38243 000041BB 81C3[2A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38244 000041BF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38245                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38246 000041C0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38247 000041C3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38248 000041C5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38249 000041C6 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38250 000041C8 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38251                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38252 000041CB 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38253                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38254                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38255 000041CE C3                              retn
 38256                                  
 38257                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 38258 000041CF 803E[F346]01            	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38259 000041D4 75F8                    	jnz     short disable_exit
 38260 000041D6 F606[E946]02            	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 38261 000041DB 75F1                    	jnz     short disable_exit

 38396                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38397                                  ;
 38398                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38399                                  
 38400                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38401                                  
 38402                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38403                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38404                                  mapcase:
 38405 00004233 51                      	push	cx
 38406 00004234 56                      	push	si
 38407 00004235 1E                      	push	ds
 38408                                  
 38409 00004236 06                      	push	es
 38410 00004237 1F                      	pop	ds
 38411                                  
 38412                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38413                                  
 38414                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38415                                  
 38416                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38417 00004238 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38418                                  ;else
 38419                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38420                                  ;endif
 38421                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38422                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38423                                  	;xor	si, si
 38424                                  
 38425                                  convloop:
 38426 0000423A AC                      	lodsb
 38427 0000423B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38428 0000423D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38429 0000423F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38430 00004241 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38431 00004243 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38432 00004245 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38433                                  noconv:
 38434                                  
 38435                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38436                                  
 38437                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38438                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38439                                  
 38440                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38441                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38442                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38443                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38444                                  ;
 38445 00004248 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38446 0000424B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38447 0000424D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38448 0000424F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38449                                  check_eol:
 38450 00004251 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38451 00004253 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38452 00004255 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38453 00004257 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38454                                  ;endif
 38455                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38456 00004259 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38457                                  convdone:
 38458 0000425B 1F                      	pop	ds
 38459 0000425C 5E                      	pop	si
 38460 0000425D 59                      	pop	cx
 38461 0000425E C3                      	retn

 38487 0000426D C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0

 38548                                  
 38549 000042B3 2EFF36[531F]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 38550 000042B8 2EA3[531F]              	mov	[cs:DevEntry],ax
 38551 000042BC BB[6A03]                	mov	bx,packet
 38552 000042BF 2EFF1E[531F]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 38553 000042C4 2E8F06[531F]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 38554 000042C9 C3                      	retn

 38556                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38557                                  ;
 38558                                  ; procedure : todigit
 38559                                  ;
 38560                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38561                                  
 38562                                  todigit:
 38563 000042CA 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 38564                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 38565                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38566 000042CC 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 38567                                  	;cmp	al,9
 38568                                  	;ja	short notdig
 38569                                  	;clc
 38570                                  	;retn
 38571                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38572 000042CE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 38573 000042D0 F5                      	cmc
 38574                                  notdig:
 38575                                  	;stc
 38576                                  notdig2:
 38577 000042D1 C3                      	retn
 38578                                  
 38579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38580                                  ;
 38581                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38582                                  ;
 38583                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38584                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38585                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38586                                  ;
 38587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38588                                  
 38589                                  getnum:
 38590 000042D2 53                      	push	bx
 38591 000042D3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38592                                  b2:
 38593 000042D5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38594 000042D8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38595                                  
 38596 000042DA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38597 000042DB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38598                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38599                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38600 000042DC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38601 000042DE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38602 000042E0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38603 000042E1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38604 000042E3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38605 000042E6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38606                                  
 38607 000042E8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38608                                  
 38609 000042E9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 38610 000042EC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38611 000042EE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38612 000042F0 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38613 000042F2 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38614 000042F4 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38615 000042F6 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38616 000042F8 7417                    	je	short b15
 38617 000042FA 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38618 000042FF 7410                    	je	short b15
 38619 00004301 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38620                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38621                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38622                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38623                                  	;nop
 38624 00004303 740C                    	je	short b15
 38625 00004305 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38626 00004307 7408                    	je	short b15
 38627 00004309 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38628 0000430B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38629 0000430D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38630 0000430F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38631                                  b15:
 38632 00004311 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38633 00004316 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38634                                  b1:
 38635 0000431B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38636 0000431D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38637 0000431F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38638 00004320 C3                      	retn
 38639                                  badnum:
 38640                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38641                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38642 00004321 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38643                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38644 00004323 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38645 00004327 5B                      	pop	bx
 38646 00004328 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38647 00004329 C3                      	retn
 38648                                  
 38649                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38650                                  
 38651                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38652                                  
 38653                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38654                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38655                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38656                                  ;	si = 0
 38657                                  ;	ax = country id
 38658                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38659                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38660                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38661                                  ;
 38662                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38663                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38664                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38665                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38666                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38667                                  
 38668                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38669                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38670                                  
 38671                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38672                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 38673                                  
 38674 0000432A 57                      	push	di
 38675 0000432B 50                      	push	ax
 38676 0000432C 52                      	push	dx
 38677                                  
 38678 0000432D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38679 0000432F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38680 00004331 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38681 00004334 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38682 00004337 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38683                                  
 38684 00004339 06                      	push	es
 38685 0000433A 56                      	push	si
 38686                                  
 38687 0000433B 0E                      	push	cs
 38688 0000433C 07                      	pop	es
 38689                                  
 38690 0000433D BF[8E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38691 00004340 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38692 00004343 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38693                                  
 38694 00004345 5E                      	pop	si
 38695 00004346 07                      	pop	es
 38696 00004347 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38697                                  
 38698 00004349 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38699 0000434C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38700 0000434F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38701                                  
 38702 00004351 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38703 00004352 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38704 00004354 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38705 00004357 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38706 0000435A E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38707 0000435D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38708                                  
 38709 0000435F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38710 00004361 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38711 00004365 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38712                                  
 38713 00004367 46                      	inc	si
 38714 00004368 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38715 00004369 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38716 0000436A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38717 0000436B 5F                      	pop	di
 38718                                  
 38719                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38720 0000436C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38721 0000436F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38722                                  
 38723                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38724                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38725                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38726 00004371 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38727 00004373 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38728 00004375 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38729 00004378 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38730                                  
 38731                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38732 0000437A 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38733 0000437C 46                      	inc	si
 38734 0000437D 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38735 0000437E E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38736                                  
 38737                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38738                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38739 00004380 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38740                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38741 00004381 F9                      	stc
 38742 00004382 C3                      	retn
 38743                                  
 38744                                  setdosdata_fail:

 38751 00004388 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]

 38764

 38787

 38797

 38803 000043E4 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself

 38805 000043E9 F9                      	stc

 38807 000043EC 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38808                                  
 38809 000043EE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx

 38813 000043F5 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field

 38816 000043FB 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 38817 000043FC 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 38818 00004400 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38819                                  
 38820                                  	;if	bugfix
 38821 00004402 E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 38822                                  	;endif
 38823

 38826

 38913                                  
 38914                                  getcountrydestination:
 38915                                  
 38916                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38917                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38918                                  ;
 38919                                  ;input: al - data id
 38920                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38921                                  ;on return:
 38922                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38923                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38924                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38925                                  
 38926                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38927                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38928                                  
 38929                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38930                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38931                                  
 38932 0000444F 51                      	push	cx
 38933                                  	;add	di,74
 38934 00004450 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38935                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38936 00004453 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38937 00004456 47                      	inc	di
 38938 00004457 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38939                                  
 38940                                  getcntrydest:
 38941 00004458 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38942 0000445B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38943                                  
 38944 0000445D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38945 00004461 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38946                                  
 38947 00004463 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38948 00004466 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38949                                  
 38950                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38951                                  	;add	di,41
 38952 00004468 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38953                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38954 0000446B E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38955 0000446D F9                      	stc
 38956                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38957                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38958                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38959 0000446E 59                      	pop	cx
 38960 0000446F C3                      	retn
 38961                                  
 38962                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38963                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38964 00004470 47                      	inc	di
 38965                                  
 38966                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?

 38970                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38971

 38982 00004479 C3                      	retn
 38983                                  
 38984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38985                                  
 38986                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38987                                  
 38988                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38989                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38990                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38991                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38992                                  ;
 38993                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38994                                  ;	 be moved.
 38995                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38996                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38997                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38998                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38999                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39000                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39001                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39002                                  
 39003 0000447A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39004 0000447B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39005 0000447E F9                      	stc
 39006 0000447F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39007 00004481 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39008 00004482 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39009                                  
 39010 00004484 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39011 00004486 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39012 00004488 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39013 0000448A F9                      	stc
 39014 0000448B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39015                                  ricb_exit:
 39016 0000448D C3                      	retn
 39017                                  
 39018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39019                                  
 39020                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39021                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39022                                  %if 0
 39023                                  
 39024                                  set_country_path:
 39025                                  
 39026                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39027                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39028                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39029                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39030                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39031                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39032                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39034                                  
 39035                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39036                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39037                                  
 39038                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39039                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39040                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39041                                  
 39042                                  	push	si
 39043                                  
 39044                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39045                                  	push	es
 39046                                  	pop	ds
 39047                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39048                                  
 39049                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39050                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39051                                  
 39052                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39053                                  	inc	si
 39054                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39055                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39056                                  
 39057                                  scp_default_drv:
 39058                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39059                                  	int	21h
 39060                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39061                                  
 39062                                  scp_setdrv:
 39063                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39064                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39065                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39066                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39067                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39068                                  
 39069                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39070                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39071                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39072                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39073                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39074                                  
 39075                                  scp_root_dir:
 39076                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39077                                  scp_path:
 39078                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39079                                  
 39080                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39081                                  scpath_exit:
 39082                                  
 39083                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39084                                  	push	es
 39085                                  	pop	ds
 39086                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39087                                  
 39088                                  	pop	si
 39089                                  	retn
 39090                                  
 39091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39092                                  
 39093                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39094                                  
 39095                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39096                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39097                                  ;carry set if not.
 39098                                  
 39099                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39100                                  
 39101                                  	push	ax
 39102                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39103                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39104                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39105                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39106                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39107                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39108                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39109                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39110                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39111                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39112                                  
 39113                                  cdletter_no:
 39114                                  	stc
 39115                                  cdletter_exit:
 39116                                  	pop	ax
 39117                                  	retn
 39118                                  
 39119                                  %endif
 39120                                  
 39121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39122                                  
 39123                                  move_asciiz:
 39124                                  
 39125                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 39126                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 39127                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39128                                  
 39129                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39130                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 39131                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 39132                                  
 39133                                  masciiz_loop:
 39134                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39135 0000448E F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 39136 00004491 A4                      	movsb
 39137                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 39138                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 39139 00004492 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 39140 00004494 C3                      	retn
 39141                                  
 39142                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39143                                  
 39144                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 39145                                  ;
 39146                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 39147                                  
 39148                                  badfil:
 39149 00004495 0E                      	push	cs
 39150 00004496 07                      	pop	es
 39151                                  
 39152 00004497 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 39153                                  badload:
 39154 00004499 BA[514A]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 39155 0000449C BB[0E4A]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 39156                                  prnerr:
 39157 0000449F 0E                      	push	cs
 39158 000044A0 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 39159 000044A1 E81D00                  	call	print
 39160                                  prn1:
 39161 000044A4 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 39162 000044A7 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 39163 000044A9 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 39164 000044AB B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 39165 000044AD CD21                    	int	21h
 39166 000044AF 46                      	inc	si
 39167 000044B0 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 39168                                  prn2:
 39169 000044B2 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 39170 000044B4 E80A00                  	call	print
 39171                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39172                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 39173 000044B7 803E[5503]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 39174                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 39175                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 39176 000044BC 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 39177                                  	
 39178                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39179                                  	;call	error_line
 39180 000044BE E966E4                  	jmp	error_line
 39181                                  ;prnexit:
 39182                                  	;retn
 39183

 39185                                  
 39186                                  print:
 39187 000044C1 B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 39188 000044C3 CD21                    	int	21h
 39189                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 39190 000044C5 C3                      	retn
